name: Flash Furniture High Back Office Chair | White LeatherSoft Office Chair with Wheels and Arms
reviews: UPDATE 1 Year Review: The positives I gave this chair some credit for on my initial reviews was looks and cushion. Well, after using this chair 3-5 days a week while working from home for a year, I can honestly say the initial cushion quality has gone out the window. The cushion has not held up....to the point where I‚Äôm shopping for a new chair already and I plan on spending a lot more money to get a sturdy, higher quality chair. This chai wobbles and moves in places it shouldn‚Äôt now, I feel the cheap sub material through the cushion now, and so honestly regret this purchase. It looks decent and is okay if you‚Äôre a lighter/smaller person it might be good for the only, but otherwise run away.I originally posted this review with a 4 star rating, but after working from home for a week on it, I am updating my review to sow a 3 star rating based on how uncomfortable I feel sitting in it for a long period of time. It has its upside but ultimately it is a small/tight fitting chair that is now with the money for taller people wanting it for regular use.Cons:I saw some reviews talking about how narrow the arm rests/seat area is. I figured these were picky or oversized people. Turns out they were right. Compared to my prior chair from Office Max, this chair is WAY more narrow. I‚Äôm 6‚Äô3‚Äù and ‚Äúnormal‚Äù sized/athletic shaped and slender....my hips are right at the arm rests (not touching but very close). Compared to my old chair, the arm rests also extend towards the front of the seat more....coupled with the narrow seat opening, the arm rests length makes it harder to get out of the chair at an angled direction. I have to swivel my chair completely sideways and stand up straight instead of partially turning and sliding in or out sideways. Also, the seat is not only narrow sideways but is is ‚Äúshort‚Äù longways.... sitting all the way back, the seat goes about halfway toward my knees.... my old chair went almost to my knee area (difference that is noticeable in comfort/weight distribution ). It seats almost like a driver side seat in a car given how most of your weight is on just your butt and instead of spread down your hamstrings, too. The chair just seems disproportionate and smaller than it should be. Smaller people might be good though. Last complaint is I ordered a black chair and they mailed me a white one. Easily fixed but still annoying and shouldn‚Äôt happen.Pros:Whatever shortcomings it has in comfort because of design/size, it at least got it right in the padding. This chair is one of the more comfortable home office chairs I‚Äôve sat in under $200 when it comes to the seat cushion. The padding seems to be thick and solid without being too supportive or too soft. Aside from that, the overall look is very sharp. The chrome is nicely done and spruces the chair‚Äôs appearance up. They did a good job on the overall look. Also, the chair went together quite easily. Packaging was good, too.Conclusion:While there is enough of a cramped seat feeling to make it worth 2 stars deduction, and if it was too much smaller I would have returned it, the chair is nice enough looking and cushioned enough to make the $105 chair worth keeping now that I have it...and at the end of the day it is just big enough to work. I work from home and have already spent several hours sitting and it seems to be a a decision I‚Äôll be able to live with, but I wouldn‚Äôt order it again if I could do it all over.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 May 2019

name: Flash Furniture High Back Office Chair | White LeatherSoft Office Chair with Wheels and Arms
reviews: This chair looks nice and is very comfortable. I really wish it came with a gold finish instead of chrome, but for the price you can't get everything you want. It came packed well and delivery was quick and easy. I put this together in about 45 minutes. I used a ratchet screwdriver instead of the Allen wrench provided. Many people said that the castors were hard to pop in,  but they popped right in for me. I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 for 2 reasons- first, the holes on the right side of the chair did not line up well. I would have had this chair put together much faster if it wasn't for this. After some trial and error, I had to complete the left side first (back and arm) in order to be able to pull the pieces together tight enough to make the holes line up on the right side.  Even then it was a struggle.  The other reason is that it can with a slight tear on the very back of the seat piece. It was covered once the back was put on, but it does raise concerns about the longevity of the chair. This is for a home office with limited usage, but I think if my dogs jump on it, it may tear. I will update this review if there are any issues. Overall, not a bad piece. Slightly overpriced for the issues. This was my first time putting a chair together.** update** Although the size of this chair is great for me at 5' tall, my husband (6') mentioned it being a little small for him. The seat is narrow and short. Not something I noticed, but he wouldn't be comfortable all day in it. He also noticed lots of ways to adjust the chair- I didn't realize you could adjust the lumbar support!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 3 February 2018

name: Flash Furniture High Back Office Chair | White LeatherSoft Office Chair with Wheels and Arms

date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 14 September 2023

name: Flash Furniture High Back Office Chair | White LeatherSoft Office Chair with Wheels and Arms
reviews: Overall, this chair was mostly fine with one serious problem: the back isn't well supported. It looks like a solid back but it's just a metal frame with fabric and elastic in the interior of the back. When I lean back into the chair, the back just gives way (see second picture). My last chair had a continuous board in the very back so that the back padding compressed against something sturdy. This chair just seems to have an elastic band buried in there. Even worse, I can feel it when I lean back. Another minor gripe is that the chair felt a bit small but that could just be that I'm used to somewhat oversized chairs and I like to sit cross-legged in the chair sometime.Other than that, the chair was fine. It arrived on time and undamaged. The packaging was reasonable and assembly was quick. There were some minor imperfections (first and third pictures) but nothing serious. Disassembly was a bit of a PITA but that's not really the manufacturer's fault.It looks pretty nice. Too bad it doesn't feel that nice.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 January 2024

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: The chair comes with 4 screws for the very bottom.  One screw that attaches the back of the chair would not remain in the hole. The screw hole is stripped.  Therefore you cannot sit all the way back in the chair.  You have to sit in it like a stool.  Since it was so cheap i never bothered with trying to send it back in etc.  I deal with it.

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 May 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: The chair is comfortable and does provide lumbar support, much more than my old chair. However, I have looked to see why the back of the chair leans downward and too the left a bit when I lean back, and I cannot see any way to change that. As long as I do not sit in it for hours at a time, I cannot see that it will make a difference unless it has a weakness that eventually gives way.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 June 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: you do have to assemble everything which is easy comes with tool and the  parts are labeled according to instructions  super easy ....i have installed office furniture for 20+ years its not elite by any stretch  however if treated properly will do the trick (no kids leaning every which way lol)
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 August 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: This was a good buy for home office chair
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 January 2022

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: I read other people's reviews before buying, and many said that assembly was very easy. I found that not to be the case. Maybe we ended up with a defective one, but none of the holes for the screws lined up properly. It took both my husband and I a good part of the afternoon to put this together. I generally do not have an issue putting things like this together. Once it was finally together, it looks like a decent chair for the price.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 August 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: I bought this chair for my 6 yr old to use for virtual learning at home.  It's a cheap office chair, but she's little, so no big deal.  It was easy to assemble.  It's comfortable enough.  BUT - the hydraulic is shot within 45 days of use by a 6 yr old...  She's not constantly adjusting it up and down.  Over time, any weight in the seat lowers the hydraulic instantly.  Now she can't sit high enough to be at her desk.  I tried to return it, but Amazon said I'd need to box it up.  Nobody has time to disassemble a busted chair and find a box for it to fit in.Learn from my lesson.  Buy a different chair.  Or buy this one and go ahead and buy a replacement hydraulic lift cylinder because you're going to need one.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 October 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: I purchased this chair for fifty dollars back in August. I see the seller increased the price. I don't respect that at all. Price gouging is disgusting. Sellers are taking advantage of the increased need for home office furniture and supplies.In terms of the chair, there are better options out there. The chair was easy for me to assemble. It took about 20 minutes. There really is no support in the cushion. And the worst part is it squeaks so loudly. Every movement on the chair, there is a loud jarring squeak. I've tried using products to lubricate the moving parts and nothing has worked. The chair works for it's intended purpose, sitting at a desk. It's loud and uncomfortable. I would not recommend it. For the current listed price of eighty dollars, there are better options.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 October 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: Bought for home schooling. The quality is great. Only concern is the thickness of the seat cushion. After a couple of months of use the cushion seems thinner.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 4 October 2020

reviews: I bought this chair for my 6 yr old to use for virtual learning at home.  It's a cheap office chair, but she's little, so no big deal.  It was easy to assemble.  It's comfortable enough.  BUT - the hydraulic is shot within 45 days of use by a 6 yr old...  She's not constantly adjusting it up and down.  Over time, any weight in the seat lowers the hydraulic instantly.  Now she can't sit high enough to be at her desk.  I tried to return it, but Amazon said I'd need to box it up.  Nobody has time to disassemble a busted chair and find a box for it to fit in.Learn from my lesson.  Buy a different chair.  Or buy this one and go ahead and buy a replacement hydraulic lift cylinder because you're going to need one.

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2024

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VN-H03-White Executive Chair, for Office, Rotating, Lumbar Support, Adjustable Arms, Mesh, Ergonomic Design, 22.0 x 23.4 x 39.4 inches (56 x 59.5 x 100.5 cm)
reviews: I bought this chair for my wife.Pros: Simple assembly with tool included (hex key). Assembly time was 30 minutes with one cup of coffee.  Looks nice. Now here is the primary kudo, 1x fastener each and plastic cap were included as spares, something I am beginning to see more often - nice.Cons: Instructions could have been more verbose, I myself didn't need it, but I could see some people would. The plastic plugs that cover the four screws on the back of the chair continuously fall out. Simple solution, a small dab of hot glue, just small dab, so you can take them back out if ever needed.  I imagine that Elmers Glue (a small dab) would do the same trick.Overall, the price of $39.99 made it a sweet deal if it lasts for several years. The price is why I bumped it up to 5 stars. My office chair is mountain gorilla-butt strength and runs over $250.00.

reviews: When I first got the box I saw that there were some black stains and the seat but they were so tiny you couldn‚Äôt tell unless you look really close so I didn‚Äôt want to go through the work of returning and waiting for another. reviews: The chair is comfortable and does provide lumbar support, much more than my old chair. However, I have looked to see why the back of the chair leans downward and too the left a bit when I lean back, and I cannot see any way to change that. As long as I do not sit in it for hours at a time, I cannot see that it will make a difference unless it has a weakness that eventually gives way.

reviews: you do have to assemble everything which is easy comes with tool and the  parts are labeled according to instructions  super easy ....i have installed office furniture for 20+ years its not elite by any stretch  however if treated properly will do the trick (no kids leaning every which way lol)
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 August 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: This was a good buy for home office chair
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 January 2022

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: I read other people's reviews before buying, and many said that assembly was very easy. I found that not to be the case. Maybe we ended up with a defective one, but none of the holes for the screws lined up properly. It took both my husband and I a good part of the afternoon to put this together. I generally do not have an issue putting things like this together. Once it was finally together, it looks like a decent chair for the price.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 August 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: I bought this chair for my 6 yr old to use for virtual learning at home.  It's a cheap office chair, but she's little, so no big deal.  It was easy to assemble.  It's comfortable enough.  BUT - the hydraulic is shot within 45 days of use by a 6 yr old...  She's not constantly adjusting it up and down.  Over time, any weight in the seat lowers the hydraulic instantly.  Now she can't sit high enough to be at her desk.  I tried to return it, but Amazon said I'd need to box it up.  Nobody has time to disassemble a busted chair and find a box for it to fit in.Learn from my lesson.  Buy a different chair.  Or buy this one and go ahead and buy a replacement hydraulic lift cylinder because you're going to need one.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 October 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: I purchased this chair for fifty dollars back in August. I see the seller increased the price. I don't respect that at all. Price gouging is disgusting. Sellers are taking advantage of the increased need for home office furniture and supplies.In terms of the chair, there are better options out there. The chair was easy for me to assemble. It took about 20 minutes. There really is no support in the cushion. And the worst part is it squeaks so loudly. Every movement on the chair, there is a loud jarring squeak. I've tried using products to lubricate the moving parts and nothing has worked. The chair works for it's intended purpose, sitting at a desk. It's loud and uncomfortable. I would not recommend it. For the current listed price of eighty dollars, there are better options.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 October 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: Bought for home schooling. The quality is great. Only concern is the thickness of the seat cushion. After a couple of months of use the cushion seems thinner.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 4 October 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: I bought this chair for my 6 yr old to use for virtual learning at home.  It's a cheap office chair, but she's little, so no big deal.  It was easy to assemble.  It's comfortable enough.  BUT - the hydraulic is shot within 45 days of use by a 6 yr old...  She's not constantly adjusting it up and down.  Over time, any weight in the seat lowers the hydraulic instantly.  Now she can't sit high enough to be at her desk.  I tried to return it, but Amazon said I'd need to box it up.  Nobody has time to disassemble a busted chair and find a box for it to fit in.Learn from my lesson.  Buy a different chair.  Or buy this one and go ahead and buy a replacement hydraulic lift cylinder because you're going to need one.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 October 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) OC-MC735-Black1 PayLessHere Executive Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Swivel, Rolling, Lumbar Support, Adjustable, 23.0 x 22.8 x 39.0 inches (58.5 x 57.8 x 99 cm), Japanese Authentic Import
reviews: I purchased this chair for fifty dollars back in August. I see the seller increased the price. I don't respect that at all. Price gouging is disgusting. Sellers are taking advantage of the increased need for home office furniture and supplies.In terms of the chair, there are better options out there. The chair was easy for me to assemble. It took about 20 minutes. There really is no support in the cushion. And the worst part is it squeaks so loudly. Every movement on the chair, there is a loud jarring squeak. I've tried using products to lubricate the moving parts and nothing has worked. The chair works for it's intended purpose, sitting at a desk. It's loud and uncomfortable. I would not recommend it. For the current listed price of eighty dollars, there are better options.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 October 2020

reviews: Ps: per chi dice che il poggiapiedi scivola, semplicemente stringete la manopola per bene, forte :)Ho sempre avuto il problema di scivolare con il "sedere" (scusate la parola) in avanti e quindi tenere la postura sbagliata.Questa sedia risolve il problema: la seduta, la parte del "sedere" √® pi√π bassa rispetto alle cosce vicino alle ginocchia, quindi la schiena non tende a scivolare in avanti.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Italy on 6 September 2023

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: If (like me) you didn't get the assembly instructions, here's the pdf.  Enjoy!4bcf1892-e6d0-44fd-83f3-979a864ed7a5.pdf
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 8 September 2020

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I bought the drafting chair to go with my standing desk (Varidesk). The raise and lower piston action is smooth although the chair sinks about an inch when I load it by sitting.The footrest will not stay in place. I'm tall enough that having it at the bottom of its range is fine. But others have complained and I have found it will not stay put for long above the bottom of its range for long, regardless how tight you turn the adjustment knob.The arms swing out of the way nicely although the left arm is slightly misaligned compared to the right one. It's a bit higher. The mesh fabric feels well made and allows plenty of ventilation which is a nice feature of this type of material.Assembly is easy and without any problems. The chair was packed well and arrived undamaged.At $200 plus tax its worth it principally because of how comfortable it is and the functionality a tall adjustable chair provides for those of us using it with a standing desk.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Tr√®s heureux de mon achat. La chaise est confortable et a √©t√© tr√®s facile √† monter.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 25 April 2022

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I picked it up from Amazon warehouse deals, said there would be damage missing parts - but no issues at all, box was absolutely destroyed. Well packed - not a scratch or scuff I could find.Wheels aren't great, immediately got upgraded to the rollerblade style, seemed to slide more than roll with the stock set.For a 6'2 big guy - it's pretty comfortable, but I wish I could move the backrest back about an inch / 1.5" just so the seat booster was farther forward than it currently is. But compared to most - I'm definitely not complaining - way better for the big/tall types than most of the ergo chairs.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 2 February 2023

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Just received it, was able to build quickly and easily, first impression - Holy smokes this is comfortable.  I have Ankylosing Spondylitis and my body has a lot of pain.  This feels amazing.  It is perfect for my sit/stand desk.  The only thing I wish it had was a head rest - which I never thought I needed.  However, I think maybe it's out of habit but I leaned back and went whoa - there's no headrest, haha.  But again, no biggie.  I love the lower back support and the seat.  It's perfect.  I'm a small frame / short person (5' 1") and this chair is a perfect fit.  I really love it.  It also looks nice and was well made.  I did end up making one modification, I added different wheels.  Similar to roller blades and it eliminated my need to have a floor mat which I really loved.  Again, I haven't had this chair long so I can not attest to longevity, but initial impression are an A.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 April 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: the foot rest does not work, you cant use a chair that rises that high with your feet hanging like that, do not buy thishow the foot rest was designed was for a knob to tighten and clamp a smooth piece of metal and plastic with such force that it stays in place, the design is makes zero sense,impossible to tighten enough with your barehands, the only way is to grab a clamp, and just absolutely destroy the plastic and destroy your hands trying to tighten iteven then it barely stays in place...extremely dissapointed
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 7 November 2020

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Tr√®s confortable. Mes pieds ne se rendent pas tr√®s bien √† la barre, mais ce sont mes jambes qui sont trop petites.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 17 May 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I am loving my chair for my work from home patio office.  We had a countertop height work station built that doubles as a casual eating surface.  My chair is just the right height.  I love it that the arms fold up.  It is supremely comfortable and seemingly well built. I always wait 30 days before reviewing to make sure that my first impressions are validated and withstand the (short) test of time.  My only minor quibble is that the chair sinks a couple of inches when my 250lbs nestle in the seat.  That may be an issue for some but I am at just the right height for my table.  If it was a high top I may need an inch or 2 more height.  No issues with the foot rest but I bought a small VIVO foot rest that works perfectly and is just the thing when you want to stretch your legs out during long work sessions.  I recommend it highly.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 May 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Very happy with this chair, perfect bar height and great size for tall and large man!
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 28 October 2020

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I couldn‚Äôt be happier with this chair! I‚Äôve had two major back surgeries and in line for a third one. I am an artist and have had great difficulty sitting at my art table for longer than an hour with my previous chair. This chair has changed all that! It is super comfortable in the seat cushion area and the adjustable arm rest are equally comfortable. Because of my back issues I added two lumbar pillows, as you can see in the two included photos I‚Äôve attached.  I placed one high and one low. This puts me as close to a 90 degree setting position and is the only way I can sit without lower back pain. I have this same set up in my office chair and car seat. Needless to say, adding the lumbar pillows is in no way a direct reflection of this chairs already comfortable nature. It would certainly be comfortable without any additions. I am a special case, with pre-existing conditions. Those of you with back problems will already understand the importance of finding a comfortable seat that won‚Äôt aggravate your back further. What I needed most out of my search for a new chair was, 1). Must be well built, 2). Must be comfortable for an extended period of time and lastly, 3). Must have adequate height adjustability for my tall art table. This chair has delivered all those requirements in spades and I couldn‚Äôt be happier! If you have back issues, this is the chair for you! Hope this feedback helps someone. :)
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 October 2020

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: The first thing to understand is that the foot ring is poorly engineered and is in need of retooling.  I did find a way to rectify the problem inexpensively. I ordered some black 2.2  or 2 1/4 " hose clamps from Amazon. After setting the desired height of the foot rest simply clamped them directly under the rest. perhaps in overkill i used two clamps one below the other, after tightening both the existing hand knob and the newly added clamps.  I have used the chair for more than a week without any further problems. I weight in excess of 200 lbs. and use the footrest to step on to the chair, as it is set to the highest position.  I will say the chair is very comfortable.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 October 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Got this for a shop work chair. My back couldn't take the bar stools I was sitting on any more. I have no other choices to compare it to. But I am very happy with my purchase. Won't give it 5 because I have nothing to compare it to. Good buy.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 14 March 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Bought this for my wife's home office and she loves it. Pretty easy to put together also.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2024

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Love everything about this chair
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 10 July 2020

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I received this chair a few days ago and assembled it within an hour of receiving it. Overall it's a fantastic chair - comfortable, arms can go up/down as well as fold back, foot rest is adjustable, and wheels work smoothly. However the seat cushion smells horribly of mold/mildew. I'm not sure what happened, the box was bone dry but the seat cushion just fills my room up with awful smell and even lingers on my clothes when I leave the room. I tried white vinegar but it didn't work, now it just smells vaguely like vinegar but still entirely like mold. Reached out to the manufacturer's email, no response. Will try calling but so far I'm pretty upset as this would be perfect if not for the horrible smell.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Comfy and perfect for the job. Easy assembly.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 October 2023

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I have this chair now for a week, and the first few days, I really liked it. It's a perfect match to my standing desk, especially, I installed caster wheel on the desk which raised about 2 inches. I like my chair to tilt when I sit down. I have the tilt resistance to low. However, starting yesterday, I noticed that it started to make some squeaky noise when I'm sitting down. Maybe it just needs to be lubricated? I don't know but the noise is getting louder. Besides this annoying noise, like I said, I like this chair overall, but I can't give it a 5 start especially it's only a week's old and already making some noise. I know that it's still under the return period, but do I really want to disassemble it and send it back? I already threw away the boxes.UPDATE: May 5, 2023: The creaking noise is getting louder and more frequent.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2023

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: We like it and the height range is good but the seat does get stained easily
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 March 2023

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I need a desk chair with a seat height of 24-25" and it is difficult to find one.  Regular desk chairs are usually lower, and drafting chairs are usually higher.  This one fits the bill for me.  I did not install the foot ring as it was unnecessary for my seat height.  The only reason I didn't give it overall five stars is the mesh back.  I prefer a fully padded one but this seems to be the way most chairs come these days.  Overall, very pleased.

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Comfy and perfect for the job. Easy assembly.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 October 2023

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I have this chair now for a week, and the first few days, I really liked it. It's a perfect match to my standing desk, especially, I installed caster wheel on the desk which raised about 2 inches. I like my chair to tilt when I sit down. I have the tilt resistance to low. However, starting yesterday, I noticed that it started to make some squeaky noise when I'm sitting down. Maybe it just needs to be lubricated? I don't know but the noise is getting louder. Besides this annoying noise, like I said, I like this chair overall, but I can't give it a 5 start especially it's only a week's old and already making some noise. I know that it's still under the return period, but do I really want to disassemble it and send it back? I already threw away the boxes.UPDATE: May 5, 2023: The creaking noise is getting louder and more frequent.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2023

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: We like it and the height range is good but the seat does get stained easily
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 March 2023

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I need a desk chair with a seat height of 24-25" and it is difficult to find one.  Regular desk chairs are usually lower, and drafting chairs are usually higher.  This one fits the bill for me.  I did not install the foot ring as it was unnecessary for my seat height.  The only reason I didn't give it overall five stars is the mesh back.  I prefer a fully padded one but this seems to be the way most chairs come these days.  Overall, very pleased.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 January 2022

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I couldn‚Äôt be happier with this chair! I‚Äôve had two major back surgeries and in line for a third one. I am an artist and have had great difficulty sitting at my art table for longer than an hour with my previous chair. This chair has changed all that! It is super comfortable in the seat cushion area and the adjustable arm rest are equally comfortable. Because of my back issues I added two lumbar pillows, as you can see in the two included photos I‚Äôve attached.  I placed one high and one low. This puts me as close to a 90 degree setting position and is the only way I can sit without lower back pain. I have this same set up in my office chair and car seat. Needless to say, adding the lumbar pillows is in no way a direct reflection of this chairs already comfortable nature. It would certainly be comfortable without any additions. I am a special case, with pre-existing conditions. Those of you with back problems will already understand the importance of finding a comfortable seat that won‚Äôt aggravate your back further. What I needed most out of my search for a new chair was, 1). Must be well built, 2). Must be comfortable for an extended period of time and lastly, 3). Must have adequate height adjustability for my tall art table. This chair has delivered all those requirements in spades and I couldn‚Äôt be happier! If you have back issues, this is the chair for you! Hope this feedback helps someone. :)
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 October 2020

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: The first thing to understand is that the foot ring is poorly engineered and is in need of retooling.  I did find a way to rectify the problem inexpensively. I ordered some black 2.2  or 2 1/4 " hose clamps from Amazon. After setting the desired height of the foot rest simply clamped them directly under the rest. perhaps in overkill i used two clamps one below the other, after tightening both the existing hand knob and the newly added clamps.  I have used the chair for more than a week without any further problems. I weight in excess of 200 lbs. and use the footrest to step on to the chair, as it is set to the highest position.  I will say the chair is very comfortable.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 October 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Got this for a shop work chair. My back couldn't take the bar stools I was sitting on any more. I have no other choices to compare it to. But I am very happy with my purchase. Won't give it 5 because I have nothing to compare it to. Good buy.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 14 March 2021

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Bought this for my wife's home office and she loves it. Pretty easy to put together also.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2024

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Love everything about this chair
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 10 July 2020

name: Flash Furniture Kale High Back Dark Gray Mesh Spine-Back Ergonomic Drafting Chair with Adjustable Foot Ring and Adjustable Flip-Up Arms
reviews: I received this chair a few days ago and assembled it within an hour of receiving it. Overall it's a fantastic chair - comfortable, arms can go up/down as well as fold back, foot rest is adjustable, and wheels work smoothly. However the seat cushion smells horribly of mold/mildew. I'm not sure what happened, the box was bone dry but the seat cushion just fills my room up with awful smell and even lingers on my clothes when I leave the room. I tried white vinegar but it didn't work, now it just smells vaguely like vinegar but still entirely like mold. Reached out to the manufacturer's email, no response. Will try calling but so far I'm pretty upset as this would be perfect if not for the horrible smell.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2021

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: Big enough for my fat butt, and it‚Äôs so comfortable! Like sitting on a cloud. I just have one big disappointment and that‚Äôs the purple is not purple. It‚Äôs burgundy. I was very disappointed by the color.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 April 2022

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: Love the color and it fits perfect with my desk
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 July 2023

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I recently realized that I just bought this chair *over* 2.5 years ago (when I bought it, I figured I'd need new executive chairs FREQUENTLY due to competitors' quality) and I have put about 10 hours per week into this chair for >2.5 years - even while sweating in the Texas heat - and my chair still hasn't shown even a hint of wanting to show any wear/aging. My chair looks like new.  When I went to buy a computer chair before I bought this one, I did lots of research and thought that I needed to find a $500+ chair if I was going to have a chair that would last for more than a couple years - but for whatever reason this chair has held up wonderfully - so lucky, so grateful. Reach out if you have questions. Houston, TX
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 April 2019

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: Chair has insane lumbar support, so if that's not your deal don't buy it. Personally love it, very easy to assemble, nice material, comfortable, ect. Used super saver shipping and it got here in 4 days so that's $40 you don't have to spend. Also I would like to add I initially planned to buy a chair at Staples but not only did they not have any associates in the store except for at customer service they also didn't have their advertised chair I wanted to buy.  After that I said well I'll check out Office Max. After making my choice following 10 minutes of browsing the chairs without so much as a hello I went to the register with the slip for my choice and 15 minutes later I still didn't have a chair.  So I left and bought this one.  It took me 3 tries but I eventually made the right choice. Moral of the story, why pretend that a chain will do half as much as Amazon.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 23 October 2012

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I ordered this chair twice before, but it must have been coming from China because it took forever to get to me, so I cancelled it twice.  It was from another seller.  This chair co said it would be here in less than a week, SO I tried to buy it again.  I came in quickly and it was easy to put together.  Love the microfiber fabric, and the color is beautiful.  I just wish it would be a little softer, a higher back, and it would recline a little more.  It is hard to nap in it. Other than that, I love it.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 March 2021

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: So, first off, there are no assembly directions. Granted, it's not too hard to figure out, but it would have been nice. Also, one of the anchors on the chair body to screw the armrest into was very crooked. My husband and I had to tag team, and auth a lot of sweat and swearing we finally got that on there. The arms are honestly the hardest part. Otherwise, it's a pretty color and comfy.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 20 June 2019

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I wasn't expecting the greatest chair in the world for the $120 I paid, but I did at least expect all the parts to line up. They didn't. Most of the bolt holes were off just enough to require some extra effort to get them lined up. The arms were another story. One arm went on reasonably easy, but for the second one the bolt holes were misaligned, AND pointing in the wrong direction. I had to get the first bolt partially into the crooked receiving threads and then use the leverage of the chair arm to bring it into line and insert the second bolt. I was quite impressed that the crooked receiving threads didn't break off their anchor point inside the chair back, because I had to bend it enough to bring the arm's bottom anchor point up about 4 inches to get it lined up.I probably should have sent it back, but I was tired of shopping for chairs, and it;s a whole lot better than the ancient piece of junk I had.The chair is as comfortable as one can expect for a hundred bucks, but I wouldn't recommend it to a friend because of the horrid manufacturing tolerances.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 May 2014

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: Seat size is 20.75 inch wide x 20.5 inch deep.  That may be the actual dimension of the seat but the true area you have to sit with the ergonomic back portion in the way is only about 16 inches deep.  This makes a very big difference to me as I like to sit cross legged in my chair with a cat in my lap.  Had I known this I would never have bought this chair.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 5 April 2019

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: This is a good basic chair for the price, but it is smaller than other chairs I have bought in the past that look like this.  Also, the seat padding is thin and after hours of sitting in it (I am 155 lbs) it looks like the seat has been flattened from years of use.  It also has no tilt on the chair but it probably is very good for someone who needs good lumbar support.  The lumbar support is better than most chairs for the price.  However, I have bought nicer chairs for the same price in the past from Sam's Club and probably would not by this again.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 January 2013

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I was looking forward to sitting in this unique chair after it was all assembled.  Well, the only thing to say is that it is a beautiful color chair.  The assembly part was not that easy to do.  Everything was fine until I got to the arm handles.  They would not fit no matter which way the arms were positioned.  The screw holes do not line up and therefore are useless.  The product was made in China so that should tell you everything right there.  Flash furniture has a nice variety of different chairs to choose from but they are not well built. On a side note, the box arrived damaged and the packets that are supposed to keep it fresh were busted all over the inside.  So when I took out the parts, all these little beads rolled onto the floor which is dangerous for the family pets.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 August 2016

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: Have had the chair since early January 2014 and was very satisfied and really like the chair.  Very comfortable.  In mid April one of the casters broke and I looked up Flash Furniture on the internet and sent them an email requesting information on obtaining a replacement part as well as a cover which I had broken during assembly of the chair.  I received a phone call later the same day and further described the issues with the caster and the cover.  They immediately sent replacement parts to me.  When I asked about the cost they advised there was no charge.  This is a company that obviously takes care of its customers.  Received the parts today andmade the "repairs" to the chair in about five minutes.  Great chair and great company.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 16 April 2014

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: For the first two days I thought this chair would do. On the third day, after sitting in it for a couple of hours, the foam where my butt goes was totally crushed and it was like like sitting in a board. The foam on the exact spot where my arms rested on the arm rests was totally crushed in the same way. The rest of the foam on the seat and arm rests where was not much pressure or no pressure is just fine. The crushed areas of the foam recover and seem normal the next day but it doesn't hold up top prolonged sitting. I'm 6 ft and weigh 210. If you weigh 40 or more pounds less, it might be just fine for you but I would not recommend this chair.I'm trying to disassemble it for return shipping but the pneumatic tube may be impossible to separate from the seat and bottom so I miight not be able to get it back in the box.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2013

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: Is soft and comfortable!  Has good lumbar support for back which everyone should get in desk chair!Gave 4 stars because reclining spring was broken on first chair and had to replace (ensure you proceed according to Amazon's standards, and not shippers, to ensure replacement guaranty)!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 December 2018

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I gave it five stars because I like it and can find no fault with it. I bought it to replace a much less expensive chair that broke at 3 years and six months of use, and had a warranty of exactly 3 years. The major difference between the two chairs is that this one has a more solid construction. The back is attached to the seat with a large (basically) L shaped bracket that takes the pressure of my back  and will surely hold up much longer than the previous chair's construction. That other chair's back was only supported by the attachment of the arms, and it was the arms that broke because of that.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 December 2012

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I ordered two of these chairs to replace the cheap ones I previously had which began to peel.  These were easy to assemble.  I initially had problems with one of them: the hydrolic lift was not supporting my weight.  But simply shifting the base a bit so it was more snug solved the problem.  Sturdy and the durable.  A good purchase.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 May 2013

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I ordered this more than a year ago. My bf was hunting for jobs for the past year so he stays at home a lot. He sits on the chair for about 8hrs everyday for 8 months and the seat cushion is almost completely flat. You will feel like you are sitting on top of iron. He was not that heavy, ~180 lb.It would be a wonderful one if you do not use it that often. It was really comfortable when I first ordered it
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 June 2014

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: It's a little wobbly and the arms need to occasionally be re-tightened, but it's super easy to assemble and looks fantastic. I can sit in the chair comfortably for hours; I'm pretty tall and it's roomy enough that I can sit Indian-style in the seat if I wanted to. Generally happy with my purchase.  :)
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 June 2014

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: This chair is great for the price! It has the features I was looking for, so I don't have anything to complain about. I use it for long hours working on the computer and it has been a big improvement over my previous setup. It was pretty easy to put together, the arms were a little tricky to get lined up right, but I was also really tired when I put it together. I just couldn't wait until the next morning, though! Overall, I am very happy.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 January 2017

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: This product is a great color, comfortable, and easy to assemble. The only problem I had is after a couple of months the pneumatic lift started to fail and I found myself sitting way to low at my desk. I would understand if I was a larger person or if I jumped into the chair every day but this was from normal wear and tear.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 15 August 2013

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: i got my chair yesterday and I installed it this morning only used 15 minutes all by myself.This chair is just great! everything I wanted. Since I have lumbar disc herniation so I really really need the lumbar support function of the chair. And the back design of this one is just amazing!Also, I love this grape/wine color. It definitely looks elegant.I saw some negative review of this chair in other colors. I guess people don't have a lumbar problem probably won't find this chair a life saver. But I LOVE it!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 November 2012

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: Is soft and comfortable!  Has good lumbar support for back which everyone should get in desk chair!Gave 4 stars because reclining spring was broken on first chair and had to replace (ensure you proceed according to Amazon's standards, and not shippers, to ensure replacement guaranty)!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 December 2018

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I gave it five stars because I like it and can find no fault with it. I bought it to replace a much less expensive chair that broke at 3 years and six months of use, and had a warranty of exactly 3 years. The major difference between the two chairs is that this one has a more solid construction. The back is attached to the seat with a large (basically) L shaped bracket that takes the pressure of my back  and will surely hold up much longer than the previous chair's construction. That other chair's back was only supported by the attachment of the arms, and it was the arms that broke because of that.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 December 2012

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I ordered two of these chairs to replace the cheap ones I previously had which began to peel.  These were easy to assemble.  I initially had problems with one of them: the hydrolic lift was not supporting my weight.  But simply shifting the base a bit so it was more snug solved the problem.  Sturdy and the durable.  A good purchase.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 May 2013

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: I ordered this more than a year ago. My bf was hunting for jobs for the past year so he stays at home a lot. He sits on the chair for about 8hrs everyday for 8 months and the seat cushion is almost completely flat. You will feel like you are sitting on top of iron. He was not that heavy, ~180 lb.It would be a wonderful one if you do not use it that often. It was really comfortable when I first ordered it
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 June 2014

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: It's a little wobbly and the arms need to occasionally be re-tightened, but it's super easy to assemble and looks fantastic. I can sit in the chair comfortably for hours; I'm pretty tall and it's roomy enough that I can sit Indian-style in the seat if I wanted to. Generally happy with my purchase.  :)
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 June 2014

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: This chair is great for the price! It has the features I was looking for, so I don't have anything to complain about. I use it for long hours working on the computer and it has been a big improvement over my previous setup. It was pretty easy to put together, the arms were a little tricky to get lined up right, but I was also really tired when I put it together. I just couldn't wait until the next morning, though! Overall, I am very happy.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 January 2017

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: This product is a great color, comfortable, and easy to assemble. The only problem I had is after a couple of months the pneumatic lift started to fail and I found myself sitting way to low at my desk. I would understand if I was a larger person or if I jumped into the chair every day but this was from normal wear and tear.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 15 August 2013

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: i got my chair yesterday and I installed it this morning only used 15 minutes all by myself.This chair is just great! everything I wanted. Since I have lumbar disc herniation so I really really need the lumbar support function of the chair. And the back design of this one is just amazing!Also, I love this grape/wine color. It definitely looks elegant.I saw some negative review of this chair in other colors. I guess people don't have a lumbar problem probably won't find this chair a life saver. But I LOVE it!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 November 2012

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: Have had the chair since early January 2014 and was very satisfied and really like the chair.  Very comfortable.  In mid April one of the casters broke and I looked up Flash Furniture on the internet and sent them an email requesting information on obtaining a replacement part as well as a cover which I had broken during assembly of the chair.  I received a phone call later the same day and further described the issues with the caster and the cover.  They immediately sent replacement parts to me.  When I asked about the cost they advised there was no charge.  This is a company that obviously takes care of its customers.  Received the parts today andmade the "repairs" to the chair in about five minutes.  Great chair and great company.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 16 April 2014

name: (Grape Purple) - Flash Furniture GO-725-GRPE-GG High Back Grape Microfiber Upholstered Contemporary Office Chair
reviews: For the first two days I thought this chair would do. On the third day, after sitting in it for a couple of hours, the foam where my butt goes was totally crushed and it was like like sitting in a board. The foam on the exact spot where my arms rested on the arm rests was totally crushed in the same way. The rest of the foam on the seat and arm rests where was not much pressure or no pressure is just fine. The crushed areas of the foam recover and seem normal the next day but it doesn't hold up top prolonged sitting. I'm 6 ft and weigh 210. If you weigh 40 or more pounds less, it might be just fine for you but I would not recommend this chair.I'm trying to disassemble it for return shipping but the pneumatic tube may be impossible to separate from the seat and bottom so I miight not be able to get it back in the box.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2013

¬†I bought the set of 2 for $98, shipping was fast and no items were damaged upon arrival!Easy installation, step #5 confused me and was the one mistake I made lol, it looks like they want you to install the bar on the edge but its actually the middle! (Just so everybody knows LOL) anyways took 1 hour each, I used no electric drill, but I highly recommend a LONGER screwdriver because the one they provided was tiny and gave no grip causing blisters on my hands. Besides that, the side table is very sturdy and strong. Im 105lbs and I was able to stand full weight on it no cracks, no funky sounds. Definitely a steal! Ps excuse my conversation with my boyfriend haha üòÇ

These were about the only style of any Furinno furniture I could find in cherry, in fact. They are doing the job, but I wish they were taller.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 15 July 2023

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 September 2023

name: Furinno Turn-N-Tube End Table, Dark Cherry/Black, Set of 2, Width 13.4 x Depth 13.4 x Height 19.7 inches (34 x 34 x 50 cm)
reviews: They both took me 10 minutes max to put together. They don‚Äôt look cheaply made to us, and go with our bedroom furniture perfectly. We just set our drinks and devices that are charging on it at night. I wipe it down with Lysol wipes. It‚Äôs very simple, affordable, and durable.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 June 2023

name: Furinno Turn-N-Tube End Table, Dark Cherry/Black, Set of 2, Width 13.4 x Depth 13.4 x Height 19.7 inches (34 x 34 x 50 cm)
reviews: These are cheap, but decent tables. They fit well with a similar TV stand that I bought. I thought it would be nice to put ferns on them to green up the space. I had accidentally over watered one and had a small puddle of of water seep through the bottom of the pot. I noticed this within 5 minutes of setting the plant down and quickly cleaned everything up. That 5 minutes was enough to do considerable damage to the table. It seems like the water cause the adhesive to come undone and possible the particle board to expand. It's not dry and there's nothing I can do about it now. It's not the end of the world and I'm still going to use the table but overall is a testimate to how cheaply these made. I do not recommend anyone pick these up when there are likely similarly priced, higher quality tables available
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 July 2023

name: Furinno Turn-N-Tube End Table, Dark Cherry/Black, Set of 2, Width 13.4 x Depth 13.4 x Height 19.7 inches (34 x 34 x 50 cm)
reviews: Perfect size for a pair of ~12" home theater speakers that would have been a huge pain to mount. I think they look much nicer than all of the dozens of styles of dedicated pedestal speaker stands I've seen at similar or higher price points. Much easier and less commitment than wall mounted shelves, too.Gave only 3 stars for sturdiness as this is a point of concern that buyers should be aware of. The legs are made of plastic, so the 15 lb. weight limit should not be tested. That being said, they still feel quite sturdy and had no more noticeable wobble or flex than steel or wood legs in a similar design.2 of the 8 couplings embedded in the wood tops were a little loose, and rotate when tightening the legs down. This is easily fixed with a bit of glue, if any concern, but with 3 other legs on each being very tight I saw no need.As long as you're not depending on these for anything heavy, fragile, or valuable, they should serve you fine.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 20 January 2021

name: Furinno Turn-N-Tube End Table, Dark Cherry/Black, Set of 2, Width 13.4 x Depth 13.4 x Height 19.7 inches (34 x 34 x 50 cm)
reviews: These are 2 nice little tables.  Even though the main 4 legs are plastic it feels sturdy.  I wouldn't put more than the 15lb recommended weight.  It maybe able to hold more but that's your choice.  Went together super easy.  I would recommend these for an inexpensive end table.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 April 2023

name: Furinno Turn-N-Tube End Table, Dark Cherry/Black, Set of 2, Width 13.4 x Depth 13.4 x Height 19.7 inches (34 x 34 x 50 cm)
reviews: Easy to put together and sturdy. Even my 18 year old chihuahua Spanky likes them, he walks on the bottom and sits there as well lol. But seriously I recommend them. name: VECELO Nightstands Set of 2 Modern Bedside End Tables, Night Stands with Drawer and Storage Shelf for Living Room Bedroom, Industrial Metal Frame, 2 Pack, Walnut Brown
reviews: I absolutely love the VECELO End Tables Set of 2! These nightstands have been a fantastic addition to my bedroom. The design is modern and sleek, and the vintage brown color adds a touch of elegance to the room. The drawers and shelves offer ample storage space, keeping my essentials neatly organized and easily accessible.The industrial metal frame not only looks stylish but also adds sturdiness to the tables. I appreciate the high-quality construction that ensures these nightstands will last for years to come. They are incredibly sturdy, and I have no worries about them holding up to everyday use.One of the best things about these nightstands is their affordable pricing. They provide excellent value for the money spent, giving me a high-end look without breaking the bank. The quality and features they offer at this price point are truly impressive.Assembly was a breeze! I was able to put them together without any hassle, thanks to the clear instructions and well-organized parts. It took no time at all, and I could start enjoying my new nightstands immediately.I'm impressed with the overall craftsmanship and attention to detail. These nightstands have truly elevated the look of my bedroom, creating a cozy and inviting ambiance. I highly recommend the VECELO End Tables Set of 2 to anyone looking for stylish, sturdy, and affordable nightstands that are easy to assemble. They are worth every penny and more!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 August 2023

name: VECELO Nightstands Set of 2 Modern Bedside End Tables, Night Stands with Drawer and Storage Shelf for Living Room Bedroom, Industrial Metal Frame, 2 Pack, Walnut Brown
reviews: So I'm not thrilled with it but it's reasonable for the price point.  I have purchased cheaper sets that have been higher quality but my daughter wanted this badly so I chose not to return it.  A lot of stains and scuffing right out of the box on the drawer assembly parts. All the parts had scratch marks or chips on them in at least a few spots.  The assembly was fine until the D screws at the end, they just didn't line up. I ended up having to leave them out because they just weren't long enough or threaded correctly.  Also, if you're going to require a Philips head screw driver for more than half the assembly, you may as well make all the screws universal rather than split it to have some screws that fit only the allen wrench. Cute but annoying and I'm not sure if I should have spent as much on it as I did.

reviews: Okay sooo the nightstands are super cute, but omg the assembly instructions were an absolute NIGHTMARE to read. The first page with the list of components and parts was A OK! No complaints, but oh my god the other side was a hellish ordeal. The assembly instruction page was printed onto the components/parts page UPSIDE DOWN!! And I can‚Äôt forget to mention that there was a bunch of parts/screws and the wording was tiny! Trying to decipher what image/word went with what page was exhausting, and I seriously wanted to gouge my eyes out!! I think I went half blind at some point from straining my eyes. Sorry about the pics. The instructions are wrinkled because I clearly took out my frustrations on them. Anyway for looks I give it a 5! Sturdiness a 4 because one of the sides came with a little chip in the corner. Overall I‚Äôm happy with the purchase. Pro tip: definitely DO NOT try to assemble when intoxicated or under the influence üòÇ

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: The product was well packaged, good instructions, no missing parts and pretty easy to assemble. It's perfect for my use in our gazebo.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 18 June 2021

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: Build quality on this is laughable. Screw holes are tack welded in place and not even close to square. Gaps anywhere pieces were welded together. Paint is uneven throughout to include missing in spots.  Just look at the pictures, maybe the new guy built the one I got. Would not recommend, would not buy again.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 23 February 2020

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: The table was very easy to put together. The table was just as shown. It fits perfectly in the spot I needed it. Highly recommend!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 January 2024

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: This end table works great as a speaker stand.  I currently have 2 which support my 22lb Klipsch RP-160M monitors on a carpeted floor.  Also, at 30 inches high,  they sat next to my computer desk perfectly.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 10 December 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: I had an issue with the table as it had slight damage to a wood piece.  The company resolved the issue to my satisfaction.Table is as advertised.  The exact size I needed for an odd spot.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 November 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: I appreciated the fact that a screwdriver for assembly was included.I use the shelves to support my BrewArt BrewFlo Beer kegging system.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 3 December 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: This is a nice, sturdy little table I bought for my home office to hold a printer and various files, etc.  I was very surprised at how clear the instructions were and how easy it was to put together.  No missing drilled holes or parts, clear easy to read instructions in English (which almost never happens) and they even include screwdriver so you don't have to break out the tool box.  That alone is worth the 5 stars to me.  Very pleasantly surprised with this purchase and I recommend it.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 July 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: I like the look, height, shelves.Metal bars were warped and twisted. Had to work on it a bit to get it to stop wobbling.Assembly wasn't bad.I'd say it's worth $25 bucks at best.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 July 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: This was exactly what I was looking for. Very easy to put together and they give you a Phillips screwdriver. You also have extra screws different sizes. I looked and looked for a tall table to put my whatever John so I can sit and watch TV and then the next shelf to put my laptop on awesome very sturdy very very good price m. Made really well
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 July 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: Table was packaged very well. Most effortless piece of furniture I've ever assembled!  Three types of screws and they give you an extra one of each.  Also included a nice screwdriver.  Instructions were printed on a large piece of paper and were simple to understand.  All pieces were clearly marked. Not crazy about the color but will have a printer on it so not much will show. Thanks for the attention to detail!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 18 June 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: We used this for a wine cooler. Looks very good. Very sturdy, the top can look kind of cheap but you can‚Äôt really see it so it doesn‚Äôt make much of a difference to us. Overall I‚Äôd suggest and but again!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 August 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: Easy to put together and very sturdy! We're using it for our power station which is very heavy! Fits the EGO power station, the same brand light and batteries on the bottom. Love the table!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 August 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: I got this to put stereo equipment on. It fits perfectly beside the cabinet I have. It was super easy to put together and each package of screws had one extra. And, a Phillips head screwdriver was included. The packing was well done, the instructions were clear and easy to follow. Nice it has 3 shelves total so there is ample room for storing other items. Very nice for the price.

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: I bought it to add more storage options.  One of our printers is on the top with room on the side for the router.  the other two shelves are nice and deep and high.  All of the holes lined up with no problem.  For a change, it was better than expected.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 March 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: Overall, this side table was fairly easy to put together, however, there are some quality defects that should be addressed. One of the legs where you screw in the feet were not properly milled, so all of my other legs has to be loosened rather than snug as intended. This has caused some issues with the sturdiness of the table itself. Overall not had for the price, but hopefully the manufacturers can fix these simple issues.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 6 August 2022

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: I ordered this table to go next to our love seat and it‚Äôs the perfect size. Easy enough to put together in about 15-20 min and it even came with a screw driver which was surprising!

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
