name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: OMG ! Everything about this item was exceptional. The packaging the material even a screwdriver and an extra screw of each type. THIS IS HOW TO RUN A BUSINESS !!!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 March 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: Used as a PC stand because the height near enough matched my desk and it contrasted nicely.PROSThe veneer looks good, with rich colours that look as good as the product page ones, if not better.Easy to assemble but fiddly (see cons).When tightened, very sturdy.CONSWhen assembling, leave all bolts loosely fitted until all are seated, then tighten. Just because 3 of 4 bolts fit and tighten, doesn't mean the 4th one fits meaning you have to slack the other 3 back off.Don't overtighten, especially the top shelf. The mounting sockets will turn VERY easily in the wood and become useless.The veneer is paper thin, so be careful when assembling. Same goes for the finish on the steel. Both are very easily damaged, so take care.Worth the money, but be careful assembling.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 September 2022

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: OMG ! Everything about this item was exceptional. The packaging the material even a screwdriver and an extra screw of each type. THIS IS HOW TO RUN A BUSINESS !!!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 March 2023

name: VECELO Side Table, Night Table, Stylish, Open Shelf, Storage Rack, Storage Around the Bed, Small Items, Width 21.7 x Depth 13.8 x Height 29.9 inches (55 x 35 x 76 cm), 3 Tiers, Multi-functional, Shelf, Brown, Easy Assembly
reviews: Used as a PC stand because the height near enough matched my desk and it contrasted nicely.PROSThe veneer looks good, with rich colours that look as good as the product page ones, if not better.Easy to assemble but fiddly (see cons).When tightened, very sturdy.CONSWhen assembling, leave all bolts loosely fitted until all are seated, then tighten. Just because 3 of 4 bolts fit and tighten, doesn't mean the 4th one fits meaning you have to slack the other 3 back off.Don't overtighten, especially the top shelf. The mounting sockets will turn VERY easily in the wood and become useless.The veneer is paper thin, so be careful when assembling. Same goes for the finish on the steel. Both are very easily damaged, so take care.Worth the money, but be careful assembling.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 September 2022

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: I didn't plan on having this table out this long but it has now become the dinner table in my small apartment.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 February 2024

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: Ok. Not sure how I want to handle this. I Don't like the orange closure tab.  The legs are completely different. The legs on the table are telescoping but sure isn't easy to engage the holes. it's incredibly stiff. The bright orange plastic thing that holds it closed is RIDICULOUS!!!! My husband had to use plyers to pull it away from the table out of the hole drilled into the side. So stupid. I can see someone walking past it at my sale and either cutting themselves or pulling the entire table over as it snags them as they walk by. I am not impressed at all. Keep looking folks.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 16 June 2023

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: Excellent for garage sales or a patio lunch for the family and friends. The possibilities are endless!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 December 2023

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: Was pleasantly surprised.  it is the perfect size and easy to set up.  Color looks nice too.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 August 2023

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: 21.5-29.5"H, as stated in the description is misleading since the dash in English means "through". But this table is not variations between 21.5 through 29.5"H; it's just one or the other. I really liked the light weight and easy set up, but 29 is way too high for things like using as a desk or card table, and it's higher than a standard dinner table. 21.5 is barely above coffee table height. I had to get a different one and sent this one back. I really liked it otherwise.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 10 February 2022

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: Was great
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 August 2023

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: This table is described as having a 220 pound static load capacity.  I weigh 160, which is way below the max capacity, and more than the computer equipment I will be placing on it.  So as soon as I unpacked it, I lied down on it (better to test it when I can still return it, if it fails).  There is a little wobbling, as there would be with ANY folding table.  But I felt nice and secure.  It was about $10 more than a comparable table.  But the extra $10 is worth the nicer "wood look" finish on the plastic top.  When set up, there is no sagging in the middle that I can see, even with the compuer equipment on the table.  Finally, the legs only have one horizontal bar towards the top (no "X" bars, no bar at the bottom).  So it is easier for someone to sit at the ends of the table, if needed,.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 July 2020

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: I originally purchased this for my jewelry crafting. The first table came with a puncture. While in a corner, I still preferred undamaged goods. This vendor was quick to replace my purchase. I find the adjustable legs to be a great feature. I had it lower so I could sit at my sofa. Since getting the table, though, I use it as a secondary desk, so I haven't had to constantly adjust the height. I don't overly abuse it but I do have 3 stacks of 2" files, a 4" stack of magazines and a metal file holder with 6 files. The table seems to be holding up well with no visible buckling. I've dismantled it once, and the handle was a nice feature too. I was also looking for a simulated wood table top, which this is. The cost was an important consideration. All in all, I'm very happy with my choice. If I had the space, I'd buy another one!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 July 2020

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: I bought two of these actually I loved the first one so much, this is like 300% better than those white chunky fold-out tables, even when the box arrives you‚Äôre like wow that‚Äôs efficient. It‚Äôs strong and super lightweight and the legs snap longer so the whole thing is super well built and an awesome price
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 October 2022

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: For around 37 bucks this is actually a really good dam table.The legs are pretty stable and equal without unessary wobbling, and the table itself is heavy and hard like a table should be not some cheap plastic materal that schools uses with their plastic foldable tables.It's multi-purpose in the fact you can carry it anywere, it's pretty heavy though.No assembly required, it already comes assembled and folded.... Still it could have uses a user manuel in how to unlock it for people who don't know quite how a foldable table works.For the price it's a buy, would recomend it works for my need.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 December 2018

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: This table appeared to be just what I was looking for.  Loved the brown top and it was quite lightweight.  I wanted something whose max  height was 30 in but would reduce  in height when needed.  Maybe I just got a lemon but this  table's first height was 30 in.  There was no mechanism to secure the legs at a height lower than 30 in so unfortunately I had to return it. and pick up a different brand from a brick and mortar store.  Just posting this to suggest that you fully test everything about this table within a few days of receiving it to make sure everything really works as it is described.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 30 November 2022

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: Very effective and practical.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 February 2023

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: If you are looking for an inexpensive small folding table, this isn't bad.  As far as quality, its decent enough I guess. I wouldn't recommend this table for anything particularly heavy though it will at least hold a computer and monitor with no issues.  Some of the issues I found:-The plastic top could use to be thicker.  Or at least isn't as thick as plastic tables im used to.-The clip on legs would be annoying if you had to unfold and re-fold this table a lot.-One of the clips that holds one of the clip on legs came broke, either in shipping or from the manufacturer.-The carry handle just hangs down, it doesnt clip up into place so you cant see it.  It looks bad just handing down and gets in the way for seating, though you can just turn the table around.-Seems a lot smaller than i thought it would be, though I thought it was a 6 foot table for some reason.  Looking back I see its only a 60in which is only 5 feet.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 April 2013

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: We are very satisfied with this versatile table and we use it for every meal and fold it back after that. It takes zero space and very easy to use. Our sofa had a nice ottoman, where we tried to eat meals while we're watching TV, but the top of the ottoman is soft, very difficult for cutting steaks, and also dangerous for glasses. We didn't want to buy a formal dining table for this. So we decided to buy this foldable table, just for meal. It turnt out to be perfect!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2020

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: I plan on using this table for when I start doing craft markets in the future. Right now I use it as an extra work space in my craft room and it works great.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 March 2022

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: I bought a 6‚Äô table at Walmart but needed one slightly shorter to make an L shape. This fit perfectly and looks just like the 6‚Äô one.  I have my computer, router, monitor and printer set up on it in my craft room/office.

Our sofa had a nice ottoman, where we tried to eat meals while we're watching TV, but the top of the ottoman is soft, very difficult for cutting steaks, and also dangerous for glasses. We didn't want to buy a formal dining table for this. So we decided to buy this foldable table, just for meal. It turnt out to be perfect!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 January 2020

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: I plan on using this table for when I start doing craft markets in the future. Right now I use it as an extra work space in my craft room and it works great.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 March 2022

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: I bought a 6‚Äô table at Walmart but needed one slightly shorter to make an L shape. This fit perfectly and looks just like the 6‚Äô one.  I have my computer, router, monitor and printer set up on it in my craft room/office.

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 November 2019

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: This table appeared to be just what I was looking for.  Loved the brown top and it was quite lightweight.  I wanted something whose max  height was 30 in but would reduce  in height when needed.  Maybe I just got a lemon but this  table's first height was 30 in.  There was no mechanism to secure the legs at a height lower than 30 in so unfortunately I had to return it. and pick up a different brand from a brick and mortar store.  Just posting this to suggest that you fully test everything about this table within a few days of receiving it to make sure everything really works as it is described.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 30 November 2022

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: Very effective and practical.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 February 2023

name: Flash Furniture 4-Foot Height Adjustable Bi-Fold Brown Wood Grain Plastic Folding Table with Carrying Handle
reviews: If you are looking for an inexpensive small folding table, this isn't bad.  As far as quality, its decent enough I guess. I wouldn't recommend this table for anything particularly heavy though it will at least hold a computer and monitor with no issues.  Some of the issues I found:-The plastic top could use to be thicker.  Or at least isn't as thick as plastic tables im used to.-The clip on legs would be annoying if you had to unfold and re-fold this table a lot.-One of the clips that holds one of the clip on legs came broke, either in shipping or from the manufacturer.-The carry handle just hangs down, it doesnt clip up into place so you cant see it.  It looks bad just handing down and gets in the way for seating, though you can just turn the table around.-Seems a lot smaller than i thought it would be, though I thought it was a 6 foot table for some reason.  Looking back I see its only a 60in which is only 5 feet.

name: Furinno Turn-N-Tube Haydn End Table, Amber Pine/Black
reviews: I didnt expect much but I expected this to be a bit more sturdy and more like a real table than it is. It's extremely cheap and flimsy composite/MDF stuff (and the softest screws I've ever seen) which cant really be described as a wooden table. Its closer to thick cardboard than wood. It was admittedly cheaper than other options but had I known what it would be like 'in the flesh', there's absolutely no way I'd have paid ¬£31 plus ¬£5 postage. It's worth maybe ¬£10 plus postage. Unless you are desperate dont buy it for more than that.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 August 2020

name: Furinno End Table, One Size
reviews: I really think these are good quality for the price. I just needed something cheap to put humidifiers on in my kids‚Äô rooms. I got the double pack that had white and black shelves. You can actually do both the same if you want which I didn‚Äôt realize. The black has white on the opposite side and same with the white. Which I really liked.I put them both together in less than 5 minutes. Very simple. Just twist the poles in. No tools required. Obviously the plastic poles aren‚Äôt great quality but it doesn‚Äôt affect the stand at all and really doesn‚Äôt look bad like I anticipated. I will say I prefer the all white because it looks better but I also wanted the black for a boys room. I do wish the one came with black poles!  But it can easily be changed back so I may do that if I don‚Äôt like it. I will be buying more of these for around the house!

name: VECELO Modern Nightstand with Drawer Square End, Side Table for Bedroom, Living Room, Small Space, Night Stand with Open Shelf, Stable Metal Frame, 1 Pack, Black
reviews: I bought this product to tidy up a corner of my husband's bedroom.  Discovered the kit had 2 bolts missing from the hardware kit.  I notified the company & they responded by mailing me a new packet of hardware components in a timely manner.  Kudos to them.I liked the product so well, that I purchased a 2nd unit for our spare room, where it acts as a stand for our laptop computer, with the drawer a handy place to put printer paper and other office odds & ends.  The style is so compatible with the existing desk & printer stand, that my husband didn't even notice its placement.

reviews: So I ordered 1 to set my aquarium on it. It didnt fit- the size was off- so we put in our bedroom as night stand- had ro buy another- well- much bigger and the size that was actually listed! so now I have 2 different sized night stands- looks funny
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 April 2023

name: VECELO Modern Nightstand with Drawer Square End, Side Table for Bedroom, Living Room, Small Space, Night Stand with Open Shelf, Stable Metal Frame, 1 Pack, Black
reviews: Super easy to assemble, and even easier with a power drill on a low torque setting. I felt like assembling it was just like Ikea but better because there are plastic threads in the holes for the screws that pull the wood together with the big circle screw latchy thing.The only thing that I'm disappointed about is that the drawer doesn't pull out on rails, and depends on a metal hook thing that hangs from the top side to stop the drawer from sliding out all the way. Because of this, I'd say that it isn't very smooth to slide the drawer and I would have thought for $100 each that it'd be on rails. I gave it 4 stars for that reason. Other than that, I would still recommend this item!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 December 2020

name: VECELO Modern Nightstand with Drawer Square End, Side Table for Bedroom, Living Room, Small Space, Night Stand with Open Shelf, Stable Metal Frame, 1 Pack, Black
reviews: This was easy to assemble, got it done in about 30 minutes. It's heavy and very solid and came with a pretty clever use of a hinge to keep the drawer from falling out. the metal frame will keep it from falling apart which is typical for these less expensive furniture pieces. The top is laminate particle board which is not my favorite, but for the price, it will make a great piece for my son's room.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 July 2022

name: VECELO Modern Nightstand with Drawer Square End, Side Table for Bedroom, Living Room, Small Space, Night Stand with Open Shelf, Stable Metal Frame, 1 Pack, Black
reviews: I bought two of these and they‚Äôre not bad for the price. Putting them together was pretty easy (although the instructions sometimes left out things like which way up to put pieces and then I‚Äôd realize in a subsequent step I had to reverse the orientation). I was a little disappointed because the drawers do not have rails. However they do open and close fairly easily, but it makes them feel a lot cheaper. Overall, looks nice and my cat immediately jumped up on the shelf, so I guess she approves too.

name: VECELO Modern Nightstand with Drawer Square End, Side Table for Bedroom, Living Room, Small Space, Night Stand with Open Shelf, Stable Metal Frame, 1 Pack, Black
reviews: This nightstand is great. I was really worried that it would be flimsy but that's not the case at all. This thing is sturdy and had no chips or scratches. I love it. I'm very happy with this purchase.

name: VECELO Modern Nightstand with Drawer Square End, Side Table for Bedroom, Living Room, Small Space, Night Stand with Open Shelf, Stable Metal Frame, 1 Pack, Black
reviews: This was easy to assemble, got it done in about 30 minutes. It's heavy and very solid and came with a pretty clever use of a hinge to keep the drawer from falling out. the metal frame will keep it from falling apart which is typical for these less expensive furniture pieces. The top is laminate particle board which is not my favorite, but for the price, it will make a great piece for my son's room.

reviews: I bought two of these and they‚Äôre not bad for the price. reviews: I was searching for a long time for a monitor solution where I could slide the stands underneath my turntables due to minimal space at home and most of the products I found weren't suitable for this purpose. I came across this stand on Amazon which ticked every box.The first thing you will notice when you unbox one of these is how strong and sturdy these things are. They ooze quality. No tools required, they have a simple hand knob to adjust the height. I have this adjusted to the maximum height and I have no doubt that they will have any problems holding the weight of the BX5 speakers in the long term.To summarise, they are superb and I'm more than happy with them.THE PRICE YOU SEE IS A PRICE FOR ONE.

name: K&M Konig & Meyer 26772.000.56 Table Monitor/Speaker Stand | Solid Stable V Shape Level Base | Height Adjust | Secure Safety Pin | Non-Slip/Vibration Rubber Pads | Steel | German Made | Black
reviews: Antes de tomar la decisi√≥n de realizar la compra de estos soportes invert√≠ bastante tiempo familiariz√°ndome con las distintas opciones disponibles en el mercado. Si buscas unos soportes baratos, seguro que encontrar√°s alternativas... pero si lo que quieres es hacerte con unos soportes de calidad, y este tipo de producto suele durar pr√°cticamente de por vida, creo que no vas a encontrar nada mejor. Ni siquiera apostando por modelos con un precio m√°s abultado, que los hay. ¬øPor qu√© me atrevo a afirmar algo as√≠? Te lo cuento a continuaci√≥n.- Lo primero que llama la atenci√≥n es el peso del soporte, factor importante para garantizar estabilidad (y supongo que maximizar la absorci√≥n de vibraciones). El acero se hace notar.- Los acabados son magn√≠ficos, cosa que siempre se agradece.- Vienen ya montados (olv√≠date de quebraderos de cabeza por tornillos que se van aflojando con el paso del tiempo) y lo √∫nico que tendr√°s que hacer es colocar los topes adhesivos de goma en la ubicaci√≥n id√≥nea (se incluyen cuatro grandes para la base y cuatro m√°s peque√±os para la plataforma, sobre los que se coloca cada monitor).- Es posible fijar la altura con total libertad gracias a la palomilla (nada de posiciones fijas que siempre son una limitaci√≥n).- La estabilidad es soberbia (a prueba de torpes y de casi cualquier visicitud, salvo fuerza mayor).Este dise√±o tiene dos grandes virtudes (al margen de que est√©ticamente gusten m√°s o menos): te va a permitir que aproveches el espacio que queda bajo los monitores (cosa importante porque el espacio de escritorio suele escasear) y, adem√°s, este tipo de plataforma "al aire" disipa parte de las vibraciones... los topes de goma se encargan del resto).En cuanto al tama√±o, he colocado unos monitores M-Audio AV40 Studiofile y van de lujo. En primer lugar, la diferencia en el sonido al ubicarlos a una altura adecuada es evidente (no hace falta ser ning√∫n audi√≥filo para detectarlo, te lo aseguro); en segundo lugar, el desacople es perfecto. No vas a necesitar pads de aislamiento adicionales (los t√≠picos de espuma) ni nada similar.En resumen, yo no he encontrado nada mejor y volver√≠a a comprar estos soportes sin dudarlo ni un segundo. Son robustos, pr√°cticos y cumplen su funci√≥n a las mil maravillas. ¬øQui√©n da m√°s?

reviews: I have these speaker stands in my home study, and the are holding a pair of Definitive Technology Demand D7 Passive Speakers. The build quality of these stands is really great. name: K&M Konig & Meyer 26772.000.56 Table Monitor/Speaker Stand | Solid Stable V Shape Level Base | Height Adjust | Secure Safety Pin | Non-Slip/Vibration Rubber Pads | Steel | German Made | Black
reviews: I hesitated buying these due to the price, but after some comparisons to other monitor stands these stood out as the most sturdy and adjustable. Been using them for a few months now and I'm very happy with their quality. They are sturdy and I'm not scared of them being unable to handle my KRK6s. The sound isolation also appears to be good, as it noticeably reduced the boomy/boxy-ness of my monitors (after being on the desk) and allowed for more of the dynamics to be heard.The only downside to these is the cost, but compared to what else is available right now they are a good value.

name: K&M Konig & Meyer 26772.000.56 Table Monitor/Speaker Stand | Solid Stable V Shape Level Base | Height Adjust | Secure Safety Pin | Non-Slip/Vibration Rubber Pads | Steel | German Made | Black
reviews: Los he comprado para reemplazar unos IsoAcoustics que tambi√©n son excelentes, pero antes ten√≠a los monitores sobre un rack de 4u de alto y ahora y ahora los tengo directamente encima de la mesa, con lo que los IsoAcoustics me quedaban un poco bajos a√∫n con todas las extensiones puestas.No ten√≠a claro si eran lo suficientemente robustos pero gracias a los comentarios disip√© mis dudas, y es por ello que aporto mi granito de arena con esta review. S√≠, efectivamente son muy robustos y al menos aguantan bien el peso de mis Yamaha MSP5, que no son precisamente ligeros. Lo soportes pesan un mont√≥n y se nota su calidad de construcci√≥n con tan solo cogerlos.Sin embargo hay que tener en cuenta que no poseen ning√∫n mecanismo ni a√±adido para regular la inclinaci√≥n de los monitores, con lo que esto debe correr a cargo ellos o de cualquier otro accesorio que se nos ocurra.Lo que me gusta especialmente de estos soportes, aparte de su robustez, es que dejan toda la parte inferior libre, con lo que podemos usarla para a√±adir a√∫n m√°s trastos a la mesa (yay!).En resumen, muy contento con la compra y por el precio est√°n genial. Cuestan menos de lo que pesan.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Spain on 21 July 2020

name: K&M Konig & Meyer 26772.000.56 Table Monitor/Speaker Stand | Solid Stable V Shape Level Base | Height Adjust | Secure Safety Pin | Non-Slip/Vibration Rubber Pads | Steel | German Made | Black
reviews: I have these speaker stands in my home study, and the are holding a pair of Definitive Technology Demand D7 Passive Speakers. The build quality of these stands is really great. Solid, sturdy and very well coated. They come with vibration absorption pads for both the stand and the bottom of the speakers.Would recommend these any day! Amazing Product, much better than all the cheaper and even more expensive plastic ones around on the market.One word of notice, its not the pair of stands, so you have to buy 2 of this product if you want a pair. Thought I'd mention it because I nearly made the mistake of buying only one.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 May 2020

name: K&M Konig & Meyer 26772.000.56 Table Monitor/Speaker Stand | Solid Stable V Shape Level Base | Height Adjust | Secure Safety Pin | Non-Slip/Vibration Rubber Pads | Steel | German Made | Black
reviews: I hesitated buying these due to the price, but after some comparisons to other monitor stands these stood out as the most sturdy and adjustable. Been using them for a few months now and I'm very happy with their quality. They are sturdy and I'm not scared of them being unable to handle my KRK6s. The sound isolation also appears to be good, as it noticeably reduced the boomy/boxy-ness of my monitors (after being on the desk) and allowed for more of the dynamics to be heard.The only downside to these is the cost, but compared to what else is available right now they are a good value.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 October 2020

name: K&M Konig & Meyer 26772.000.56 Table Monitor/Speaker Stand | Solid Stable V Shape Level Base | Height Adjust | Secure Safety Pin | Non-Slip/Vibration Rubber Pads | Steel | German Made | Black

name: VECELO Night Stand, End Side Table with Storage Space and Door,Modern Nightstands for Living Room,Bedroom (Charcoal Grey)
reviews: I bought 2 tables for the bedroom. They have a contemporary industrial look. I am pleased with how they complement the rest of our bedroom furniture. They are a little taller than the mattress but we plan to buy a foundation/box springs so the tables will be at the right height. The tables are sturdy. I used rubber corner protectors (from a set of tables from another company) on the front-facing corners because the corners could cause injury if you bump into them. I wish the manufacturer thought about these corner protectors. I will update on durability in the future.

reviews: I didn‚Äôt read the description completely so I didn‚Äôt know it came with 2 but it‚Äôs not bad for the price. Putting it together was annoying at first but once you‚Äôve built the first one the second one is really easy to put together. This thing is suppose to come with cup holders but there not good like they do not stay attached to the table so I just don‚Äôt use the cup holders, other than that though the the tables are pretty solid, they hold up nicely and look good so it‚Äôs cool

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: After a couple of months the fasteners connecting the tabletop to the legs broke off. I had to replace w a nut and bolt. They're so rickety we don't even like to use them. It was past the 30 days to return to Amazon so we'll just donate to Goodwill.  Don't purchase these!!

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: i have been looking for side table for eating while i‚Äôm sitting on my l-zy boy watching movie, and i couldn‚Äôt decide if i want C side table or foldable tray table. The idea of C table is amazing, only if i can pull it close to me. But since my l-zy boy base is not hollow to slide anything under, I‚Äôll have to keep the table on my side. The older style tray table is usually bamboo color, and although functional, they look out of date for my taste. But C table looks more modern, but cost twice the price. So finding this tray table that look more modern, came in 2 for the price of 1 C table sounds like a good deal to me. It looks really good next to my couch, and DH got his as well, is a win win for me. Assembling was easy, came with everything needed, including the screwdriver, and it feels sturdy but not too heavy, The cup holder is ok, good concept and hold my not so heavy cup fine, but it‚Äôs not drilled to the table and slides easy. Glad i bought this instead of C table!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 5 March 2022

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: I got these mostly because they are the right color for my living room, and not a common color for TV trays. Also the price was good. Assembly was okay, require a little muscle as the pre-drilled holes are meh. Got them together though and they work. Slight wobble, but not enough to make them unusable. As other reviewers have said, the cup holders are virtually useless and I left them off.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 April 2023

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: Just as another reviewer stated, we had issues with the included screws and pre-drilled holes. After contacting the company proved futile (there's only so much run-around we could take), we decided to just make the best of it and drill new holes as needed. Our box was severely damaged either during shipping or delivery. Insufficient screws included. Very disappointing all around, but at least they look prett., I guess. Value for money? I suppose next time I'll spend extra and hope for a better product.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 23 November 2023

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: The tables were very easy to assemble and are nice enough looking for what they are.  Seem stable.  They are quite difficult to fold up (compared to the set I am replacing), and I'm hoping the clips loosen up over time.  The cup holders, however are a joke.  Although other reviews complain that cups don't fit, I don't find that to be true - I use pint glasses and they fit just fine.  For me the problem is that the holders are so shallow that any jostle whatsoever causes the glass to topple out.  Fortunately I've caught it just in the nick of time, but that's kind of a dealbreaker for using the holders.  They do fit bottles.  If the cup holder was an inch or two deeper they'd be ideal.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 4 January 2023

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: Perfect for what I needed them for.  You only get two and the color isn‚Äôt exactly what I hoped for.  Looked more grey and in person is more brown.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 April 2023

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: The assembly is the worst part: these are so much harder to assemble than they should be -- the predrilled holes in the tabletop are just not really wide enough for the screws provided. You have to really push with the teeny tiny screwdriver provided in the kit -- maybe it would be easier with a low-power electric screwdriver or a more standard sized manual screwdriver?  On top of that, you really have to pull the legs tight when attaching them to get the bolt through all the pieces. This is probably significantly easier to accomplish with two people.Once assembled, the tables have a slight wobble that I think you'll get with a TV tray no matter how nice it is. They have a higher end look than most comparable products. The only buyer I'd actively dissuade from choosing this product is anyone who really needs something easy to assemble.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 January 2023

I followed the instructions and as you can see in the pics, I have 2 extra holes that you can see. Luckily they are on the bottom.

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: The tables were very easy to assemble and are nice enough looking for what they are.  Seem stable.  They are quite difficult to fold up (compared to the set I am replacing), and I'm hoping the clips loosen up over time.  The cup holders, however are a joke.  Although other reviews complain that cups don't fit, I don't find that to be true - I use pint glasses and they fit just fine.  For me the problem is that the holders are so shallow that any jostle whatsoever causes the glass to topple out.  Fortunately I've caught it just in the nick of time, but that's kind of a dealbreaker for using the holders.  They do fit bottles.  If the cup holder was an inch or two deeper they'd be ideal.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 4 January 2023

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: Perfect for what I needed them for.  You only get two and the color isn‚Äôt exactly what I hoped for.  Looked more grey and in person is more brown.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 April 2023

name: VECELO Folding TV Trays Set of 2, Snack Eating Tables with Cup Holder, Suitable for Couch, Kitchen, Living Room and Bedroom, Stable Metal Frame, Easy Assembly and Storage, Dark Blue
reviews: The assembly is the worst part: these are so much harder to assemble than they should be -- the predrilled holes in the tabletop are just not really wide enough for the screws provided. You have to really push with the teeny tiny screwdriver provided in the kit -- maybe it would be easier with a low-power electric screwdriver or a more standard sized manual screwdriver?  On top of that, you really have to pull the legs tight when attaching them to get the bolt through all the pieces. This is probably significantly easier to accomplish with two people.Once assembled, the tables have a slight wobble that I think you'll get with a TV tray no matter how nice it is. They have a higher end look than most comparable products. The only buyer I'd actively dissuade from choosing this product is anyone who really needs something easy to assemble.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 January 2023

reviews: Command√© sur Amazon et re√ßu en 3 jours , tr√®s facile a monter ( en 20 minutes a peu pr√™t ) , jolie designe , les mat√©riaux ont l'air de bonne qualit√© ( a voir dans le temps apr√®s des mois d'utilisation ) , confort un peu dur mais je pense qu'il faut qu'il se fasse car il est neuf donc !!! Parcontre , j'ai gard√© le pied et les roulettes de mon ancien fauteuil car je le trouvais plus jolie que celui d'origine , de plus les roulettes livr√© avec ce fauteuil son indigne pour le prix , elles roulent et pivotes tr√®s tr√®s mal !!! Pour le fonctionnement du fauteuil il suffis de basculer la manette vers le haut pour r√©gler la hauteur du fauteuil , pour son inclinaison suffis de tirer la m√™me manette sur la droite pour la d√©verrouiller et ainsi le fauteuil peu se basculer en arri√®re , sous le fauteuil devant l'assise il y a une grosse molette qui r√®gle la force du ressort d'inclinaison , pour durcir celle ci il suffis de visser la grosse mollette selon votre gout et donc pour un inclinaison plus molle ( plus facile ) il vous suffis de d√©visser cette grosse molette selon votre pr√©f√©rence , moi perso je l'ai d√©visser au max pour avoir une inclinaison hyper facile !!! Conclusion , bon fauteuil mis √† part les roulettes qui son absolument indigne .
date.of.review: Reviewed in Australia on 19 January 2023

name: Flash Furniture X10 Gaming Chair Racing Office Ergonomic Computer PC Adjustable Swivel Chair with Flip-Up Arms, Black LeatherSoft
reviews: I bought the grey version as a present for my brothers birthday and really liked the comfort and quality for the price. I noticed the lower back support right away. I was due for a new chair and bought the black version for myself a couple months later. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô10 and 205 lbs. The cushion is soft and firm. The height is just right with out using the leveler handle to raise it at all. The arm handles  raise up and down which is nice when I‚Äôm not using the chair to push it all the way into my desk.I started by mounting the bracket to the bottom of the seat. Then I screwed the arm handles to the back part of the seat first. After that I installed the bottom seat to the handles. Lastly I put the wheels one the base and covers/caps to the arm handles following the cylinder. Don‚Äôt forget the cylinder caps before you mount it to the chair. I did the first time around and had to hammer the base out with a towel to avoid damage to uninstall. Easy to assemble & took about 20/30minutes each time. Includes a hex key tool for the screws.Some people mention having a hard time aligning the screws with the holes but I just pressed down firmly when lined up and had no issues for both chairs. Each screw went in all the way to make contact then I tightened all of them when everything was aligned correctly. If you tighten each one right away, it can be uneven or slightly off when assembled.Price at this time is $131.83 and I bought it for $114.69 with a 20% coupon that was offered on the page. Definitely a deal if you can get it under $100
date.of.review: Reviewed in Australia on 30 November 2022

name: Flash Furniture X10 Gaming Chair Racing Office Ergonomic Computer PC Adjustable Swivel Chair with Flip-Up Arms, Black LeatherSoft
reviews: I‚Äôve been using this chair for a while now after trying a few other brands that broke and this one has been fantastic! I have had no problems whatsoever. It‚Äôs very adjustable and the swivel arms make it easy to tuck away.

name: Flash Furniture X10 Gaming Chair Racing Office Ergonomic Computer PC Adjustable Swivel Chair with Flip-Up Arms, Black LeatherSoft
reviews: I purchased this chair mainly because of the feature of the arms raising. I play guitar and wanted a chair I could sit comfortably in front of my pc without the arms being in the way. This chair does that.I read the reviews and had low expectations regarding assembly, I should have set them lower. Normally when I see negative reviews regarding assembly I chalk it up to the people not being very handy themselves, but still take it into consideration. Usually my own experience confirms that, not in this case.With that being said, I was able to assemble most of the chair without any real issues. The bottom part is very quick and easy to assemble. Assembling the left arm was a struggle but managed to get it on with the only issue being the padding making it hard to line things up on the seat of the chair.The right arm was more than a struggle when trying to bolt it to the seat. I could get one bolt started but couldn't get the other one lined up to thread. I tried starting with the other bolt, but still couldn't get them lined up to thread the second one. This was due to the padding making it difficult to line things up. I had the same issue on the left side but managed to get them in but couldn't on the right.What I ended up doing was digging through my spare bolts and found a couple with the same threading. I had to hack saw the ends to make them shorter but about 1/4 inch longer than the ones provided and was finally able to get the right arm on.The chair once assembled was pretty much what I expected and functions how I hoped.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 15 January 2021

reviews: I purchased this chair mainly because of the feature of the arms raising. I play guitar and wanted a chair I could sit comfortably in front of my pc without the arms being in the way. This chair does that.I read the reviews and had low expectations regarding assembly, I should have set them lower. Normally when I see negative reviews regarding assembly I chalk it up to the people not being very handy themselves, but still take it into consideration. Usually my own experience confirms that, not in this case.With that being said, I was able to assemble most of the chair without any real issues. The bottom part is very quick and easy to assemble. Assembling the left arm was a struggle but managed to get it on with the only issue being the padding making it hard to line things up on the seat of the chair.The right arm was more than a struggle when trying to bolt it to the seat. I could get one bolt started but couldn't get the other one lined up to thread. I tried starting with the other bolt, but still couldn't get them lined up to thread the second one. This was due to the padding making it difficult to line things up. I had the same issue on the left side but managed to get them in but couldn't on the right.What I ended up doing was digging through my spare bolts and found a couple with the same threading. I had to hack saw the ends to make them shorter but about 1/4 inch longer than the ones provided and was finally able to get the right arm on.The chair once assembled was pretty much what I expected and functions how I hoped.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 15 January 2021

L'ho testata 3 giorni prima di scrivere ma aggiorner√≤ la recensione pi√π avanti.Pro:- arriva con gi√† tutto l'occorrente (non c'√® bisogno di un cacciavite)- comoda e facilmente regolabile in altezza- la retina dietro la schiena permette un miglior passaggio dell'ariaContro:- servizio di spedizione carente (spiego meglio pi√π avanti, non so se fosse relativo a warehouse)- la pelle mi sembra sintetica e non so quanto durer√† (sono vegetariana e a me va benissimo il fatto che sia sintetica)- a prezzo pieno non so se vale 170‚Ç¨ (prezzo attuale)Non so quanto durer√†.Dico che la spedizione ha fatto pena perch√© Amazon si √® appoggiato a poste italiane che a sua volta si √® appoggiato a un terzo servizio di spedizioni piuttosto discutibile:- Il pacco √® arrivato con un buco e un pezzo di sedia che SPORGEVA fuori, inevitabilmente danneggiando la base dell'articolo.- il corriere mi ha chiamato al telefono anzich√© suonare al citofono e io non ho potuto rispondere subito, a quel punto non ha nemmeno suonato al citofono e ha DECISO ARBITRARIAMENTE che io non ci fossi quindi √® andato via. Dopo 5 minuti ho visto la chiamata persa, l'ho richiamato e mi ha detto di aver suonato (bugia clamorosa) e che era gi√† fuori citt√† quindi sarebbe passato domani (impossibile perch√© in 5 minuti a malapena esci dal mio quartiere).Ho ricevuto la sedia per miracolo solo perch√© a quanto pare in chiamata devo esser apparsa molto scocciata e perch√© palesemente in 5 minuti il camion era dietro l'angolo. üòÖ Mi auguro che se la comprate nuova almeno ci sia un servizio migliore per il prezzo pagato.

name: Flash Furniture Desk Chair with Wheels | Swivel Chair with Mid-Back Black Mesh and LeatherSoft Seat for Home Office and Desk, 41.25 x 24.5 x 25.5
reviews: I ordered this chair to pair with my new standing desk because I wanted an option to sit if I wanted to without lowering the desk.The box arrived and I lugged it upstairs and let it sit in a corner because I was absolutely dreading assembling it.Maybe it is because I had too many Ikea mishaps where I had to take apart and reassemble.  Maybe it is because I have been assembling a ton of furniture lately and it is always super annoying, frustrating and time-consuming. Regardless of my reason, I just did NOT want to do it.Today, I finally faced my fears and opened the box and WOW. This was the easiest to assemble piece of furniture ever!1. The hardware and bolts, etc. were already pre-sorted and organized into a blister pack-like cardboard holder and nicely labelled, so all you need is a scissor to open that pack when you get to that part of the instructions.2. The directions were fool proof--super clear and easy to follow with sufficient diagrams and well written text.3. All tools included (just an allen wrench).I finished assembling it in 20 minutes, which is pretty much a miracle for me.Time will tell how solid this chair is...so far it is pretty comfy and I added an additional lumbar pillow for more support. It wheels easily and is easy to raise and lower.However, I can absolutely recommend this chair if you want frustration-free assembly!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 November 2023

reviews: When putting this together a bolt got stuck in a nut, which ripped the nut out of its binding. This meant I couldn't tighten, loosen or remove the bolt to use the chair, or to pack it in the box and return it.I eventually got the chair back into the box, with the arm still attached.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Australia on 9 January 2023

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Black Mesh Swivel Ergonomic Task Office Chair with Flip-Up Arms
reviews: We were very disappointed with the quality of these chairs (we bought 4) and returned all 4 of them.  The tilt lock mechanism was dodgy and the overall tilt leaves you leaning too far back.  The mesh material also does not look durable and had stretch creases after a single sit.  The coasters (I kid you not) were such poor quality that they would not roll at all, and instead drag across the floor.  Some bolts  also do not fit correctly into the holes.  I had to use an impact hammer drill to get them to screw in.  All of the issues I experienced have been reported in other reviews, so I doubt our experience is a one off.  Amazon were great about the return, but we did have to arrange our own courier because they are too big for Amazon's automated Australia Post return process.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Australia on 17 August 2022

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Black Mesh Swivel Ergonomic Task Office Chair with Flip-Up Arms
reviews: just what i wanted
date.of.review: Reviewed in Australia on 22 March 2022

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Black Mesh Swivel Ergonomic Task Office Chair with Flip-Up Arms
reviews: Basically a disaster of a chair... looks nice, but the only options are very far forward, or forward leaning. Constantly feels like i'm going to slide off the chair forward. The adjustments don't work, the plastic feels like it's going to break. Avoid!

name: Flash Furniture Whitney High Back Desk Chair - Black LeatherSoft Executive Swivel Office Chair with Black Frame - Swivel Arm Chair
reviews: This chair was delivered to me 5 weeks ago. Packaged well, delivered on time.  It was very easily put together and is a really nice looking item .  However,  it has serious issues and I deeply regret this purchase. Its seat padding has sunk very quickly and imm constantly sliding off it as a result, the seat consistently drops to its lowest height setting  Somehow the back lumber support arch is too high, its very uncomfortable indeed.  (I am 5'8")For a budget desk chair you can't fault its appearance but it simply does not deliver in terms of comfort and seating position.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 2 June 2023

name: Flash Furniture Whitney High Back Desk Chair - Black LeatherSoft Executive Swivel Office Chair with Black Frame - Swivel Arm Chair
reviews: This chair was easy to assemble and looks lovely, however there is a small rip on one of the arms. I‚Äôve emailed the manufacturer directly and have not heard back.I spent a little more on a chair for the aesthetic and of course it is damaged. Annoyed with the lack of customer service.Edit: I was contacted and sent a new arm replacement. I get so many compliments on this chair.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 25 April 2023

name: Flash Furniture Whitney High Back Desk Chair - Black LeatherSoft Executive Swivel Office Chair with Black Frame - Swivel Arm Chair
reviews: I ordered this office chair as I needed a new one and decided to go with the white/gold to match my desk. Although the gold on the chair and my desk are two different finishes of gold, it has a bit of a chic-like look and feel to it.I know many of the reviews say this chair is very easy to assemble but it‚Äôs more like semi-easy-ish. While understanding the parts and having the knowledge of assembling the chair, it‚Äôs not as easy to assemble if you‚Äôre doing it by yourself. Many of the screw placement holes don‚Äôt fully align correctly so you have to use force to manually align your parts to each hole in order to successfully drill all of your screws in tightly. Assembly time is much slower when using a manual Allen wrench so I suggest using a powered one instead as it‚Äôs more efficient.It‚Äôs a comfortable chair and I personally like the straight back support it gives me. I have read reviews that the chair will decline in quality after heavy use but unless you are jumping on this thing, I don‚Äôt think the wear and tear will happen. I can‚Äôt say the same for the faux leather element because we just never know.Overall, it‚Äôs not a bad chair for the price. I would recommend it for yourself.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 August 2023

name: Flash Furniture Whitney High Back Desk Chair - Black LeatherSoft Executive Swivel Office Chair with Black Frame - Swivel Arm Chair
reviews: I purchased this chair to replace one my husband had bought when he was in college. I got a new job that allows me to work from home and was looking for a new chair that I could comfortably sit in all day and not suffer with back pain. We're two weeks in and it's already noticeable better than our previous. I can adjust it to lean back if I need to. I would definitely recommend it as of right now.I love the white and gold. It definitely fits with the color scheme I had planned.

reviews: I recently purchased this rolling desk chair on Amazon, and I love it. No wobbling; it feels well-built and dependable.Comfortable Design:Perfect for long hours at the desk. Great back support and just the right cushioning.Great Value:Considering the quality and speed of delivery, it's a steal. A fantastic buy for the price.In short, if you need an affordable, easy-to-assemble, sturdy, and comfy rolling desk chair, this is it! Highly recommend.

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews:
Needed a simple, reasonably-priced computer chair that swiveled and had adjustable height, a functional chair for the home office, so making a brief foray through a few local office supply stores, came here to Amazon to do some checking.The¬†
  
Flash Furniture WA-3074-BK-GG Mid-Back Black Mesh Task and Computer Chair







  
  
    ¬†seemed to be a good choice, as I wanted to try a mesh-back chair, primarily for breathability in the summer. Also didn't want a chair with any arms, as they get in the way with my personal work habits.The chair arrived in under 48 hours (thanks, Amazon Prime), and was boxed very well. The the assembly directions were reasonably clear, and it took less than half an hour to put together with the included Allen wrench. The five included caster wheels were perhaps the most difficult part of the assembly, but with a bit of wiggling they all slipped in. Fiddled with the pneumatic seat height adjustment for a few minutes, and I had a work chair.After a few weeks of use, I can make a few observations. The mesh back turned out to be more comfortable than I expected, and no wonder many like them. It not only breathes, but the support is quite good, even after hours. But... the "2-inch Thick Padded Mesh Seat" as stated in the product description is the thinnest two inches that I've ever encountered in a chair. Maybe it would be better if a more dense foam had been used. Will probably be looking for a supplementary seat pad at some point.If you're looking for a reasonably-priced chair that's similar and has arms, the¬†
  
Flash Furniture Mid-Back Black Mesh Computer Chair







  
  
    ¬†may fit your needs, but be sure to read the user reviews. A better choice might be the¬†
  
Alera Elusion Series Mesh Mid-Back Multifunction Chair







  
  
    , which offers a full range of back and tilt adjustments.Bottom line:This¬†
  
Flash Furniture WA-3074-BK-GG Mid-Back Black Mesh Task and Computer Chair







  
  
    ¬†is a decent chair if you're looking for a reasonably-priced work chair for a home office setting. Subjectively I would have preferred a chair bottom with a thicker or more dense foam cushion, but for the price, it's still a good chair.3/20/2013
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 21 March 2013

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: Purchased for use at the reception desk at our medical office. Looks very sleek and pretty. The cushion could be a little thicker for comfort but for the price I paid, I am ok with the cushion being a little thin.  The back mesh part feels great on my back (it has a slight curve to it). Assembly was super straight forward and easy! Overall a very comfortable chair that rolls around smoothly.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 July 2016

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: It‚Äôs definitely firm... there‚Äôs not a lot of padding in the seat. It gets uncomfortable pretty quick. It‚Äôs cheap so if you don‚Äôt need to sit in it for long periods of time it‚Äôs fine. If you need to be in it for multiple hours you should look into getting an additional support cushion. I think most amazon chairs of this type will be similar quality so a cushion might be the best way to go.The hydraulic seat adjuster works perfect. There‚Äôs no lean to the back of the chair.Overal it‚Äôs sturdy and won‚Äôt fall apart, just not the most comfortable.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 24 April 2020

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 15 August 2023

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: I've bought 6 of these for $45-$50, in black, for a group of people to sit in for 3-4 hours and play poker. Obviously they aren't as comfortable as my office chair which cost 10x as much, but for the price they are great.The wheels aren't great on carpet, but you can easily move the chairs around when empty but don't expect to be able to zoom around an office in the chair. The rotation works very well. The height adjustment works fine, so that people of different heights can sit happily. The back mesh is much more comfortable than I expected, and you can lean against the back quite happily. The seat is about what I expected for the price (good, but not the best).The chairs are very easy to put together after you've done it once, and can be done in about 10 minutes (the only tool you need is provided). The first time I found it a little hard to distinguish between the seat and the back on the instructions, so that one maybe took twice as long.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 April 2014

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: I'm very happy with this purchase

reviews: Was a little worried about that curved back support as I am a short waisted lady, but with a small cushion it's just right.  Young friend assembled it in less then 15 minutes.  Looks nice, does the job- what more could I ask for?

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: Cushion Is fine for hour or so but for more than that it starts aching.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 17 February 2022

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: This is a really really affordable chair compared to other mesh backed chairs. Assembly is really simple too. I'm not particularly good at putting together furniture, but I was able to assemble the chair in about 20 minutes. It's also very comfortable; however, I only had this chair for 5 weeks before the screw holding the back on broke completely in half. I'm not a heavyset person, so I was pretty surprised. Amazon replaced it, hoping the next one works better.UPDATE 1/08/14 - I've had the replacement chair for awhile and I've had no problems with it. My first one must've just had a faulty screw or I may have installed it incorrectly. Upgrading it to 4 stars.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 June 2013

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: I was wary, since a few reviews were pretty negative, but I am very happy with my purchase of this chair. I'd had a lot of trouble with my old chair -- every time I got up from working at my computer, I felt like a 90-year-old woman and could hardly stand up straight! Not from pain, really, but my lower back would be so fatigued that it could hardly hold me up!  The very first time I used this chair, that problem was resolved. I got right up and walked around just fine! I don't know the science of ergonomics or any whys or wherefores .... I just know this chair is comfortable, supports my back, and I am happy!  PS:  I put it together myself in about 20 minutes. No problem.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 May 2015

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: I bought this chair to use for sewing.  What I like a lot:  It's small, and adjusts to a height low enough to comfortably sit at my sewing table.  The seat is well padded, and the back ergonomically built to allow me to sew comfortably for hours.  I'm under 5' and weigh under a 100 lbs. so this chair is perfect for me. I looked at a lot of chairs and decided on this one because it is simple, straightforward, basic.  I would have liked to buy the Amazon basic chair but, alas, it was too big and did not adjust low enough for me.  This is a perfect basic chair for petite persons.  I highly recommend it!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 April 2016

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: I bought this chair 3 years ago and i am still liking it and still using it to this day. The only thing about it is that it isn't really a very comfortable chair if you are planning on sitting on it for over an hour. The chair does not recline so you'll have to stay seated straight up. Other than that, i'd say it is a good buy and it serves its' purpose.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 May 2018

The only thing about it is that it isn't really a very comfortable chair if you are planning on sitting on it for over an hour. The chair does not recline so you'll have to stay seated straight up. Other than that, i'd say it is a good buy and it serves its' purpose.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 May 2018

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: Didnt know I could not recline the chair, and there isnt much padding on the seat so be prepared to buy a seat cushion if you want to keep this chair.It is small so it works for small spaces but if you work at home this will be good temporarily in my opinion.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 April 2020

name: Flash Furniture Low Back Black Mesh Swivel Task Office Chair with Curved Square Back, BIFMA Certified
reviews: Easy for me to put together. I am a 78 yr old lady.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 December 2022

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: I bought it for my home office. Instructions were very, very easy with full step by step instructions with pictures and labels. Not only labeled on the instructions but also the packaging which came as it should but separated so you have the correct amount of screws for each section. For example. One side requires 4 bolts, those 4 bolts are packaged together and labeled, the next step requires 6 bolts, the 6 bolts are separated and labeled. Very easy installation. Product itself is great too.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 20 April 2023

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: Sturdy and comfortable!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 16 January 2024

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: Good for the price
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 11 August 2023

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: Working from home, i had been sitting on a diningroom chair with a cushion for way too many months so I finally decided it was time to get myself an office chair.  The chair had to hold at least 300 lbs and be under $200.  After reading the reviews, I decided to purchase this chair and I am happy I did.  It arrived pretty quickly and with minimal outside box damage.  Everything was wrapped nicely.  I arranged everything on the floor and double checked I received everything I was supposed to.  Once that process was done, it took me probably 40 minutes total to put the chair together.  I'm sure it would take some people less time but I'm not accustomed to putting things together so I'm probably really slow.  I realized towards the end of assembly that the back plastic piece that clicks onto the back, had a broken clasp.  I then proceeded to plug in the "massage" portion of the chair to see if it worked - I knew going into this that the massage feature was hit or miss with some people.  It barely worked.  I then contacted Amazon to ask about a replacement back plastic piece and massage unit.  Unfortunately the ONLY option you have is to do a full chair replacement - they could not just send parts.  I explained that the entire chair was assembled at this point and I had no intention of taking it apart so they offered me a $35 credit.  Since my main concern was a chair, and It appeared I now had a decent one, I took the credit.  The back plastic piece clicked on anyway as there are several other notches.  On to the chair itself.  I usually sit down in the morning around 7:30am and work until 6pm.  I might get up every few hours (not nearly enough), but for the most part I live in this chair for 10 hours a day.  For a chair under $200, this is a very decent chair.  By 3pm, my underside starts to hurt a bit but it's certainly better than what I was sitting in before.  The arms adjust, the height adjusts, it has decent lumbar support if you sit back in it.  You can feel the massage unit slightly when you sit back but nothing that hinders me from doing so.  At first I was slightly disappointed because I was comparing the comfort of this chair to the one in my physical office (pre pandemic) but realized that you cannot compare a $500 chair with a $150 chair.  If you have to stay within a budget under $200 and need a "plus size" chair, this is the one.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 February 2021

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: The armrests for me are just a bit too high but other than that it‚Äôs a pretty good chair. Footrest is a bit flimsy all the way extended
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 December 2022

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: Low back isn‚Äôt great for a larger man but it does the job.  The seat cushion is nothing to write home about, I get quite a sore rear after a days work at home.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 17 November 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: Initially, I had issues with shipping. It was supposed to arrive sometime because March 6th & March 10th. On March 6th I got a notification saying it was going to arrive by the evening but it never showed. Then I got a notification saying it was late and that if I didn't arrive by the 10th then I could get a refund or exchange it. The on the 10th, it said it should arrive by the 12th with the same spiel as before. Then it arrived on the 11th. (This is why I took off a star) Otherwise, it was easy to put together and for the price it's pretty good. Obviously, not top quality but I'm not complaining for the price. It works and does the job as a chair for my desk and it's pretty comfortable. I guess we'll see how that holds up after time.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 March 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: The chair is easy to put together and doesn‚Äôt take long. It‚Äôs very comfortable and light. The cushion is thick and firm. The back rest is supportive and durable.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 11 January 2024

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: I'm just over 6' tall and 270-280. I don't like light, weak or flimsy. This chair is none of that. Heavy duty, well constructed. Pretty easy to assemble -- just the last step requires a 2nd person to line things up while you lower the chair assembly onto the caster carriage. (Hint: order a set of good rubber casters -- worth it -- you won't be sorry.)I don't do adjustments -- it has some, heigth of course, and tilt. It wasn't in the write-up, but there is also a mysterious USB cable interface to your PC for "massage control"?? I haven't tried that yet and don't know what to expect since I didn't purchase for that kind of reason. But I will eventually try it...I haven't had the chair long, but comfortable, spacious, and it looks like it will wear well -- for me anyway.Last note: the shipping box is big and heavy(!) -- mine arrived pretty much destroyed... but the parts were all heavily bubble-wrapped and came through just fine.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 16 January 2021

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: Instead of the Allen wrench it gave I used  T30 torque bit or a star bit and put it on my drill to assemble the chair was a Christmas gift for gaming
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 10 January 2023

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: Nice chair
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 January 2024

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: I bought this chair as it looked very similar to a chair I had working in an office before that I liked (near same design, a few less features), and with work from home my current chair has been getting a bit rough. Perfect time to upgrade right? I'm around 330 lbs so well under the max limit for the chair.Put this together today after receiving it. First warning sign was that one of the stickers was damaged/half-ripped (the FRONT sticker on the seat) showing me this is a refurb despite being told it was new. Also one of the permanent screws that comes pre-attached to the part that goes on the bottom of the chair and links with the gas mechanism looked super crooked. One item that according to the install guide wasn't supposed to already be attached was attached (the cover for the part where all of the wheels combine) so clearly someone had already had this. The packaging it came in was partially ripped. So yeah, even though they sell "new" these are 100% refurbs.Whatever, I still put it together alone without major issue and decide to sit on it. Quickly noticed that this wasn't near as comfortable as the similar chair I had at my office. I had known it would have less features (the one I had at the office let you move the seat forward/backward easily and had a very easy to use reclining feature that you could lock in any position but I was aware this one didn't have the first feature; it also had an easy adjustment to move the arms closer/further to the chair that this does not have, you need to unscrew and rescrew the arm to make an adjustment).It's wide, that's great and no complaint there. The chair goes up and down fine. The arms are good although because they are slightly loose to allow you to move them up and down they make a minor clacking noise if you touch them. Nothing major and mostly expected. The reclining feature barely works, it seems like the chair will break if I use it and makes a weird noise. I tried to turn the lock on it to the max both sides and it doesn't seem to have an impact.So it's a mediocre chair already, but why a 1?Literally within 2 minutes of sitting on this chair I started getting back pain, and that's sitting in the optimal position too, after adjusting the back part (to the best of my ability, I wish I could just remove the pillow completely because no position was 100% comfortable). Now, I haven't had back pain in a very long time, and I don't have chronic back pain at all. This came out of nowhere. I decided to give it a chance... it is a new chair, maybe I just needed to adjust. I tried to move around on the chair and if I don't sit in a perfect sitting position (IE if I shift forward and lay back a bit) the pain amplifies 200% so that's a no go. Well, it is an office chair so ok that sucks but what after 30 minutes later? The back pain was way worse and I had to give up at that point.I'm now back with my old beat up chair letting my lower back heal up. I've never returned an Amazon product before but I may very well do so for this chair... I'm shocked it has such a high rating. I didn't pay too much attention to the rating though as I know it's not always the end-all-be-all. I mostly thought this would be a good chair based on specifications + my experience with a model that looked similar, but it isn't even close to as comfortable. I wish I could find that exact model...Lesson learned, I will never buy a chair online again.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 30 November 2020

name: FDW (Factory Direct Wholesale) VNO-735-Black1 Office Chair, Black, Ergonomic Design, Lumbar Support, Armrest, Rolling Swivel, Adjustable, Mid Back Mesh, 22.8 x 23.2 x 39.0 inches (57.8 x 58.5 x 99
reviews: The part you sit on isnt very comfortable. Its extremely flat but for the price i paid, i cant complain too much. It says ergonomic but my back does constantly hurt sitting in it. I plan on adding an actual back support at some point but i was on a budget and my dining room chair was too big for my new desk.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 August 2020
