date.of.review: Reviewed in Japan on 24 August 2023

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: It's coming up on the one year anniversary of my purchase of this chair, and I'm very pleased.About a year ago, I purchased this to go with an antique drafting table I'd set up as a hobby work space in my basement.At the time, I was looking for something very affordable, as it would only see occasional use.  Little did I know we'd soon be asked to spend the next two weeks working from home to "flatten the curve".  Thankfully the product shipped quickly, was packaged very well and was easy to set up, because a couple weeks later that antique drafting table and this chair would become my new office.To my surprise, I'm closing in on a year of flattening the curve, and this chair has held up very well for something I only expected would see occasional use.  I've had a bit of a leak in the pneumatic cylinder, but only at the upper end of the stroke.  As a result it tends to sink down about an inch from my upper level set point, but it stays firm from there and it's still within a comfortable seating height, so I normally don't notice it.As for comfort, the chair is ergonomically very comfortable with firm back support.  My only complaint would be the mesh seating can feel a little rough when you have to sit through long online meetings and decide it's shorts day at "work" that day.  Otherwise, I'm very surprise how well the mesh fabric has held up for something in this pricepoint.  It feels just as supportive as the first day in my new office, and other that some dust and food crumbs doesn't really show any wear.I may occasionally (every 3 or 4) months tighten the foot ring, but I use it all the time and regularly push off on it to reposition myself.  Overall, it's been very sturdy.As we close in on the anniversary of "two weeks to flatten the curve", it looks like I'll be continuing daily use of this chair for some time to come.  I expect it to last quite a while yet, but if it failed tomorrow I wouldn't hesitate to order another one.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 16 February 2021

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: The chair itself is good and beautiful but the wheels are very bad quality, they don‚Äôt roll and are stuck. I had to buy other ones to replace them. Also, the chair makes terrible sounds as if it was very old, I ordered lubricant oil to see if that helps get rid of the squeaking sounds that are super loud and uncomfortable.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Germany on 4 January 2022

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: I work from home so I sit a lot and was looking for a comfortable chair that would hold up over time.I‚Äôve had this chair a week now so I can‚Äôt talk about the durability over time but it‚Äôs mesh so there isn‚Äôt a foam cushion or stuffing to break down over time which has happened to me with less expensive computer chairs.It has great lumbar support although the upper part of the seat back angles a little more than I‚Äôm used to with my previous chair.Initial impression when sitting in the chair was that the cushion at the edge of the seat under the mesh was a bit uncomfortable but reserved judgement until I had a chance to use it for a while. Now that I‚Äôm used to it and it‚Äôs a bit more broken in I find that the seat bottom is comfortable for extended sitting and the arm rests are firm but comfortable enough. Speaking about the arm rests, I love that they fold up. I occasionally pick up a guitar to pluck a bit and it‚Äôs great for that use.Assembly was quick and painless, but unfortunately after putting the chair together I noticed that there was a cut in the seat back mesh. I contacted the seller and they worked with me to send a new seat back without any hassle, great customer service!Overall, I‚Äôm happy with the chair and would order it again. If I could give it 4-1/2 stars I would.Also worth noting, I‚Äôm a smaller guy at 5‚Äô10‚Äù 140lbs.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 21 June 2018

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: Mido 1.57metros y la silla es muy c√≥moda para mi altura. La malla es fuerte, al menos en mi peso (49kg) la malla se ve muy resistente. Tiene una forma que ayuda a descansar la parte baja de la espalda, que era mi mayor requisito. Los brazos son abatibles, en mi caso es una ventaja porque los necesito a veces estables y a veces abatible, puedo inclinarme hacia atr√°s sin riesgo de perder el equilibrio. Es bastante fuerte y muy bonita.

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: There are so many sub ¬£100 chairs out there, but they all look pants close up on You Tube. So I shelled out the extra cash & took a punt on this.I feel it's money well spent. Was initially a bit worried by the moulded plastic base etc, but it all fits together well (I greased every screw & washer before installing) with no creaking.Coming from an upholstered fake leather chair which lacked adjustment, this is a huge improvement. I am NOT going Herman Miller!The mesh is supportive, lumbar support is perfect for me, (active 160 lb male, 6ft), the slight rocking ability is ok, arm rests are solid & do not creak, AND lift to allow me to play guitar while in the chair.Castors are ok on carpet.I'm happy though it cost more than the usual suspects.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2021

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: When I set-up my home office, I got a cutesy office chair because I'd be in it for a couple hours a week. But now that I've been sent home to telecommute due to the pandemic, that cutesy chair has all but killed me. This ergonomic chair is comparatively cheap, aesthetically pleasing, easy to assemble, and good for me. I feel like I can tackle all my tasks! It's taller than a standard chair, which is great for use at my counter-height surfaces and use of my sit/stand desk.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 November 2020

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: Llevo 1 semana con la silla as√≠ que unas primeras impresiones. Es una silla bastante completa y se siente muy premium para lo que cuesta, los materiales son bastante s√≥lidos y firmes. Mi √∫nico problema es que la silla es demasiado alta, mido 1.70m y a√∫n con la posici√≥n m√°s baja la silla sigue estando m√°s alta que mi escritorio y mis pies quedan colgando, la barra que tiene para apoyar los pies si bien hace su trabajo tiene mucho margen de mejora, puesto que la posici√≥n en la que deja tus pies no es la m√°s c√≥moda para jornadas largas, adem√°s que el tubo empieza a molestar e incluso llega a lastimar al poco tiempo, por lo que empieza a ser inc√≥modo para la espalda despu√©s de tener un tiempo los pies colgando, haciendo que la ergonom√≠a y comodidad del asiento y respaldo no sea suficiente para liberar esa tensi√≥n en las piernas
date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 12 June 2023

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: The chair arrived fairly quickly after I ordered it at a time when products like this were in very high demand among those of us transitioning to working and teaching from home. The box was heavy but easily manageable by a single person.The assembly was relatively easy and straight forward IF you read and follow the instructions and the order of assembly. I found that putting the seat upside down on top of a coffee table and then resting the back on the floor and balancing it against the table made assembly significantly easier than if I had tried to balance the three pieces on their own.The retractable armrests are great. They are comfortable when I am using the chair and retracting them makes it infinitely easier to move the chair around and avoids many unintentional finger or hand jams against the desk. The top height is perfect for a typical high desk, which means that I can use mine either standing, as I often do, or with the chair (which I need when am leading or participating in long ZOOM sessions). The lowest level is a bit higher than a typical desk chair, but it still works for a standard height desk.The bad.I was taken by surprise that the chair is mostly made of plastic. The foot rest, the adjusting center tube and the link between the two parts of the chair assembly are the only metal parts of note. I would have preferred it if the wheeled base was made of metal and thus a bit heavier. The chair has a bit of an unstable feel to it because the wheeled base is relatively narrow and light. That said, I can sit on it for hours of lectures and meetings and have not once felt like I am losing my balance.On balance, at the lower price, a good, flexible chair that you can easily get out of your way when you want to work standing up.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 May 2020

date.of.review: Reviewed in Germany on 6 November 2023

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: There are so many sub ¬£100 chairs out there, but they all look pants close up on You Tube. So I shelled out the extra cash & took a punt on this.I feel it's money well spent. Was initially a bit worried by the moulded plastic base etc, but it all fits together well (I greased every screw & washer before installing) with no creaking.Coming from an upholstered fake leather chair which lacked adjustment, this is a huge improvement. I am NOT going Herman Miller!The mesh is supportive, lumbar support is perfect for me, (active 160 lb male, 6ft), the slight rocking ability is ok, arm rests are solid & do not creak, AND lift to allow me to play guitar while in the chair.Castors are ok on carpet.I'm happy though it cost more than the usual suspects.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 30 December 2021

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: When I set-up my home office, I got a cutesy office chair because I'd be in it for a couple hours a week. But now that I've been sent home to telecommute due to the pandemic, that cutesy chair has all but killed me. This ergonomic chair is comparatively cheap, aesthetically pleasing, easy to assemble, and good for me. I feel like I can tackle all my tasks! It's taller than a standard chair, which is great for use at my counter-height surfaces and use of my sit/stand desk.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 November 2020

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: Llevo 1 semana con la silla as√≠ que unas primeras impresiones. Es una silla bastante completa y se siente muy premium para lo que cuesta, los materiales son bastante s√≥lidos y firmes. Mi √∫nico problema es que la silla es demasiado alta, mido 1.70m y a√∫n con la posici√≥n m√°s baja la silla sigue estando m√°s alta que mi escritorio y mis pies quedan colgando, la barra que tiene para apoyar los pies si bien hace su trabajo tiene mucho margen de mejora, puesto que la posici√≥n en la que deja tus pies no es la m√°s c√≥moda para jornadas largas, adem√°s que el tubo empieza a molestar e incluso llega a lastimar al poco tiempo, por lo que empieza a ser inc√≥modo para la espalda despu√©s de tener un tiempo los pies colgando, haciendo que la ergonom√≠a y comodidad del asiento y respaldo no sea suficiente para liberar esa tensi√≥n en las piernas
date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 12 June 2023

name: Flash Furniture Mid-Back Transparent Black Mesh Executive Swivel Office Chair with Melrose Gold Frame and Flip-Up Arms, BL-8801X-GG
reviews: The chair arrived fairly quickly after I ordered it at a time when products like this were in very high demand among those of us transitioning to working and teaching from home. The box was heavy but easily manageable by a single person.The assembly was relatively easy and straight forward IF you read and follow the instructions and the order of assembly. I found that putting the seat upside down on top of a coffee table and then resting the back on the floor and balancing it against the table made assembly significantly easier than if I had tried to balance the three pieces on their own.The retractable armrests are great. They are comfortable when I am using the chair and retracting them makes it infinitely easier to move the chair around and avoids many unintentional finger or hand jams against the desk. The top height is perfect for a typical high desk, which means that I can use mine either standing, as I often do, or with the chair (which I need when am leading or participating in long ZOOM sessions). The lowest level is a bit higher than a typical desk chair, but it still works for a standard height desk.The bad.I was taken by surprise that the chair is mostly made of plastic. The foot rest, the adjusting center tube and the link between the two parts of the chair assembly are the only metal parts of note. I would have preferred it if the wheeled base was made of metal and thus a bit heavier. The chair has a bit of an unstable feel to it because the wheeled base is relatively narrow and light. That said, I can sit on it for hours of lectures and meetings and have not once felt like I am losing my balance.On balance, at the lower price, a good, flexible chair that you can easily get out of your way when you want to work standing up.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 May 2020

reviews: First off I have no idea how to build things and do things and the instructions  at first was super confusing had no idea what any of it meant. after awhile though it started to make sense and it was super easy to buildit is pretty comfortable but not as comfortable as it would look though its still so much better then my old chair. The seat part is a bit small so if you have thicker legs as myself do it can get pushed against the sides of the chair since the sides curve upwards slightly so keep that in mindit can lean back pretty far into a comfortable position to lay and relax watching tv or youtube or etc.overall it depends on the person but for me its was well worth the price

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: I‚Äôve had this gaming chair for over a year. For the price it‚Äôs a good gaming chair. The material hasn‚Äôt degraded after a year, no rips, no creases. Actually I‚Äôm quite impressed. I would‚Äôve though it would‚Äôve already started tearing, or a dent where I sit. But nope after a year it practically looks brand new (keep in mind I take care of my stuff and I‚Äôm not a kid) the only down side I would say is that the arm rests aren‚Äôt adjustable. I recommend this to anyone looking to get good quality gaming chair without having to dish out $500+.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 November 2023

date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 6 January 2024

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: I recently upgraded my gaming setup with the BestOffice Gaming Chair in the striking blue color variant, and I must say that it has significantly enhanced my gaming experience. This chair effortlessly blends ergonomic design, comfort, and a touch of racing style for an all-encompassing gaming throne.One of the standout features of this chair is the built-in footrest. It adds a whole new dimension of comfort during those intense gaming sessions. Being able to kick back and relax during breaks is a game-changer. The reclining feature, coupled with the footrest, allows me to find the perfect position for both gaming and relaxation.Ergonomics are a key factor in the BestOffice Gaming Chair's design. The lumbar support and adjustable headrest provide excellent neck and back support. The ability to customize the height and angle of the chair makes it easy to find a comfortable seating position tailored to your body.As a gamer, I appreciate the sturdy construction of this chair. It feels solid and durable, capable of withstanding hours of gaming action. The smooth-rolling casters make it easy to move around, and the 360-degree swivel allows for quick reactions in intense gaming moments.The racing-style design of the chair is a visual treat. The blue color is vibrant, and the sleek lines give it a sporty look that complements my gaming setup. It's not just functional; it's a statement piece in my gaming room.Assembly was relatively straightforward, thanks to clear instructions, and all the necessary tools were provided. I had the chair set up in no time.While the BestOffice Gaming Chair is primarily designed for gamers, it's also an excellent choice for anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish office chair. It's versatile, well-constructed, and the reclining feature makes it ideal for short breaks and relaxation during the workday.In conclusion, the BestOffice Gaming Chair with Footrest has exceeded my expectations. It combines ergonomic support, gaming-specific features, and a stylish design into one impressive package. Whether you're a dedicated gamer or in need of a comfortable office chair, this gaming chair is a top-tier choice. It's a throne that not only enhances your gaming experience but also complements your gaming room's aesthetics.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 October 2023

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: We bought 2 of these for our boys . They were thrilled once they finished putting it together which was pretty simple, they said the chair was amazing very comfortable. Actually said they felt the chair cradled them . Thank you love it !
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 29 December 2023

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: Bought for 12. Yr old birthday present. He has never been happier. He loves the. footstool, but, I do not think that part is very comfortable. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7‚Äù and to me, it just feels awkward the way it fits my legs but,  that‚Äôs not to say I don‚Äôt use it when sitting in this chair.  It is better than no stool, I just think it could be made to fit and be formed to legs lengths better. I want one to support my feet to.  BUT, it‚Äôs a GREAT chair. 7 months later and many, many active, crazy, and excited 12 yr old boys not only gaming in it but  a few occasions of it being used to sleep in for the night, and it still works, sits and looks brand new!  I was a little leary on the quality and how long it would hold up for due to the price when comparing to similar chairs and most where $150 & up. But it‚Äôs been great. And if it was going to fall apart or tear up because of it being cheap quality (which. It obviously is not) believe me, my son, whom we refer to as  ‚ÄúThe Destroying Monkey‚Äù (why we call him this-he doesn‚Äôt walk, it‚Äôs always jumping to smack ceilings and doorways, darts in and out, flips or flops on everything, yanks and tosses, the 1 to test ALL buttons, knobs, dials and all that moves, AND assembles and unassembles everything to see what‚Äôs inside, including the Thermostat on the wall @ 2.  He can tear up even proven indestructible things, if you get the picture). He would have made it fall into pieces by now. He truly puts anything he sees, plays with, or sits on To the test of its quality and it‚Äôs limitations by throwing, tossing, using it for everything it was not intended for, flopping or laying sideways and upside down in or on it, and just being an overly curious, creative, imaginative wiggle worm and 12 yr old country boy. This is a chair I highly recommend i if you are looking for a good quality chair for a very reasonable price.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 12 November 2019

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 June 2023

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: This is one of the more expensive "gaming chairs", not the most expensive, but you can find some for about half the price. If you get it on sale, I would recommend it. Overall it is a very comfortable chair to sit in for a few hours of gaming. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that there are some areas with room for improvement: I like the footrest idea, but unless you are shorter than 5'6", it really is not a great design. I am 6' tall, and the footrest ends up at about mid-calf range, which is not the most comfortable, I still end up needing something to rest my feet on. The armrests could be a little wider, with a little more cushion, maybe a little more ergonomically designed for the gamer, especially if you're gaming with a controller. I do however like the idea of the hinge aspect of the armrests, so they move back with you when you recline. Another thing I noticed (mostly due to my height again), is the neck/head pillow height. I find when I am sitting in the chair, that pillow actually ends up at my shoulders, and I can adjust it to where I need it, but as soon as I move it falls back to it's normal resting place, and I have to readjust every time I sit back down, so a nice improvement would be to see multiple slots for mounting that to accommodate a wider range of gamers more comfortably. The vibrating lumbar support cushion is a nice touch, it can help a little bit if you're getting some tension in your lower back, but it produces quite a loud buzzing sound, so often I don't use it, because it's just too distracting. The seat cushion is my favorite part of the chair, it's actually very nice and easy to sit on for long periods. The seat always tends to be the problem part of a chair for me, it's hard to find one comfortable for me to spend any time in without soreness. The long flat cushion spreads out your weight nicely, so there are no pressure points like your tailbone or in your thighs that end up hurting due to excessive pressure on that area. So, all in all, it's a decent mid range gaming chair, room for improvement definitely, particularly if you're an above average height gamer, but mostly a good solid chair, that is worth the money if you can get it for less than full price.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 12 December 2023

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: ok so first off i'll start with the positives; looks cool, the footstool part is kinda neat, came pretty quickalright, now the negatives(added pics)  not very comfortable: i had a tailbone injury years ago, and this chair, if i lean back, makes the pain flare up (im using pillows to make up for this)  - the arms are not padded and the plastic is so rough and hard, i literally had to take them off within an hour of building the chair, was causing pain in my elbows(as well not adjustable)  -  the seat of the chair is too long for my short legs(might just be a me problem)  -  The pillows are quite hard, and the bigger one i cant even use due to my back injury  Construction is poor: as shown in the pictures, those are predrilled holes, so no matter how much you play with them, the back remained crooked.  Customer service: was a joke, i sent them these pictures and they said "we dont see anything wrong" followed by "if you are unsatisfied with the chair you can send it back" so as mentioned before i have a back injury, bad enough to consider me legally disabled(i have a cane too to try and take the pressure off my back). so packing this thing up, taking it to my car and then to the post office is quite a struggle... i was just maybe hoping to get a replacement part or something.so all-in-all, spend the extra $20 and get a better chair. i would not recommend this product.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 23 May 2020

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black

This is our third gaming chair, from this company, that we have bought for our family and each person hasn't had a complaint about any gaming chair that they've received.

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: If you want to save money and have back problems, horrible comfort, a chair that starts to become wobbly after 2 months then this is for you.I've had this chair for a year and I'm surprised it hasn't been thrown into a fire yet.The feeling the poor materials that seem to become thinner as the months go one and your left sitting more on a piece of wood then even a chair. You better off just buying a stool.The arm rests are plastic and kind of lose but the screws are tight (Wonder how that happened).The chair if you move the back down make sure to move up with it or the chair will sucker punch you (Believe me I speak from experience and multiple times of the chair literally moving the back, back up and just straight hitting my jaw full force.).I already have a job that induces back pain. Why not buy a chair that adds to it! This chair doesn't have the best back support and make me feels like the chair cares more about itself then you.If I thought better when I sat on it for the first time i should have just returned it because if it is not comfortable for you and you tell yourself "Itll form to me" good luck because that sure aint never gonna happen.This chair I've tightened the screws many times but the ones for the wheels keep coming lose and for some reason i can rock the chair on the stem. That shouldn't be a problem but it is and make me think if one day im gonna lay back and just fall over.Easy to assemble, hard to enjoy,The only thing nice about this chair is the pillow vibrator but even then i dont use it because it sounds like a jet engine.Moral of the story.Don't waste your money, gaming chairs cheap or expensive isn't worth it. Buy a actually office chair because I bet you itll be more comfortable and better on your back then this piece of junk.And word to the company that makes this chair:"Please never make a chair again" thank you.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 15 November 2020

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: I don't recommend.I've previously had a gaming chair that was a bit taller than me when sitting in it, I'm 5'4", and if its kinda small for me it maybe really small for you. My feet do not touch the ground so its not short (my feet hang about an inch above the ground), but the structure feels somewhat small compared to another gamer chair I had before. Sitting fully upright and butt all the way back, I still have an inch of space before the seat touches the back of my calves, so the seat isn't that big too. Now what I do feel too wide is the arm rests, it would be nice if I could move them in more, and if I could adjust them down or up. It's tad bit too wide. When the footrest is inside the chair, it's upside down and the plastic is a little sharp, so may cut the back of your calves. The lower back-pad with vibrator is nice if using it for vibrator, but its a bit thick if not using it for vibrator, it may get annoying later. Also, the arm rests, underneath them is pretty sharp too.So basically, back-piece is a little short, seat is a little short, armrests are little wide and not adjustable, back-pad is a bit thick, and underneath the arm rests and foot rest is a bit sharp.Its not too bad, but not too good either. It was easy to install, and the wheels are tough to get in, they bit different than other wheels I seen. It is somewhat comfy seat, the back-pad with vibrator is a bit too thick though.This chair is one of the cheaper ones, but still expensive, around $100, so kind of disappointed and kind of expected. It's cheaper against the other chairs of its kind, but its not really cheap when you just think about the price.I'll probably spend $50 more and get a better chair next time. This chair is cheap compared to others like it, but its still expensive. This chair lacks customization of the features, and could work on smoothing out sharp areas of the chair that I think would make it better and probably 4/5 stars.Also, I think I'd go with one without vibrator next time too, its nice but its very sturdy and thick, I miss regular cushion. I normally sit with legs somewhat spread apart, and its a bit uncomfortable with these side pieces towards the end of the seat. They a bit too tall and sturdy. It's not a bad chair, but could be a lot better. So I give this chair a 3/5.I changed my mind to 1/5, its just not comfortable anymore, the sides on the seat irritate my thighs. I wanted to see the padding, which is good but I noticed they removed all the zipper hangings probably because so many people checking and finding things wrong, so they removed all of them to make it difficult to check. The arm rest is sharp as well as the foot rest when its docked underneath the chair, the back of my calves brush against it. The massage pad I would go without one, its just too stiff and I hardly use it. It pushes you too far in the seat because too thick and I don't get to enjoy the headrest due to how thick the massage pad is. Sitting indian style in the chair is uncomfortable too, its just not wide enough and/or the side piece is too tall and sturdy, needs to be bent outwards more and not so pointy.Pictures are showing the sharp plastic underneath the arm rest and an arm can fit in between which is bad due to sharp plastic, the sharp plastic on the footrest, and zipper without zipper grips (they must have ripped them off, due to people inspecting the padding).I just got the chair 13 July, 2020, and already want to return it.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 July 2020

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black

Overall I am pretty satisfied and I am excited to use this chair for work and gaming!

reviews: First, I want to start off with my biggest issues. I especially like the foot rest, it‚Äôs something I didn‚Äôt realize how much I needed until now.Had this chair not been missing any pieces, I would rate this a 4/5, but because it was missing pieces, I‚Äôm giving it a 3/5.

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 July 2023

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: I don't recommend.I've previously had a gaming chair that was a bit taller than me when sitting in it, I'm 5'4", and if its kinda small for me it maybe really small for you. My feet do not touch the ground so its not short (my feet hang about an inch above the ground), but the structure feels somewhat small compared to another gamer chair I had before. Sitting fully upright and butt all the way back, I still have an inch of space before the seat touches the back of my calves, so the seat isn't that big too. Now what I do feel too wide is the arm rests, it would be nice if I could move them in more, and if I could adjust them down or up. It's tad bit too wide. When the footrest is inside the chair, it's upside down and the plastic is a little sharp, so may cut the back of your calves. The lower back-pad with vibrator is nice if using it for vibrator, but its a bit thick if not using it for vibrator, it may get annoying later. Also, the arm rests, underneath them is pretty sharp too.So basically, back-piece is a little short, seat is a little short, armrests are little wide and not adjustable, back-pad is a bit thick, and underneath the arm rests and foot rest is a bit sharp.Its not too bad, but not too good either. It was easy to install, and the wheels are tough to get in, they bit different than other wheels I seen. It is somewhat comfy seat, the back-pad with vibrator is a bit too thick though.This chair is one of the cheaper ones, but still expensive, around $100, so kind of disappointed and kind of expected. It's cheaper against the other chairs of its kind, but its not really cheap when you just think about the price.I'll probably spend $50 more and get a better chair next time. This chair is cheap compared to others like it, but its still expensive. This chair lacks customization of the features, and could work on smoothing out sharp areas of the chair that I think would make it better and probably 4/5 stars.Also, I think I'd go with one without vibrator next time too, its nice but its very sturdy and thick, I miss regular cushion. I normally sit with legs somewhat spread apart, and its a bit uncomfortable with these side pieces towards the end of the seat. They a bit too tall and sturdy. It's not a bad chair, but could be a lot better. So I give this chair a 3/5.I changed my mind to 1/5, its just not comfortable anymore, the sides on the seat irritate my thighs. I wanted to see the padding, which is good but I noticed they removed all the zipper hangings probably because so many people checking and finding things wrong, so they removed all of them to make it difficult to check. The arm rest is sharp as well as the foot rest when its docked underneath the chair, the back of my calves brush against it. The massage pad I would go without one, its just too stiff and I hardly use it. It pushes you too far in the seat because too thick and I don't get to enjoy the headrest due to how thick the massage pad is. Sitting indian style in the chair is uncomfortable too, its just not wide enough and/or the side piece is too tall and sturdy, needs to be bent outwards more and not so pointy.Pictures are showing the sharp plastic underneath the arm rest and an arm can fit in between which is bad due to sharp plastic, the sharp plastic on the footrest, and zipper without zipper grips (they must have ripped them off, due to people inspecting the padding).I just got the chair 13 July, 2020, and already want to return it.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 July 2020

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: I bought this chair because I needed a new office chair for my apartment. Very sturdy so far, and I love the adjustable pillows for your back and neck/head. The first thing I noticed is that the separate components of the chair, while packaged individually, were dirty. I tried to clean the chair pieces as best as I could, and the photos that I am sharing show what remains of the dark spots. I am a bit disappointed by this. Additionally, the instructions were small pictures, with only a few words that did not explain much about how to assemble the chair. Obviously, I figured it out, but if you struggle with directions and require written instructions, ask a friend to help you. Overall I am pretty satisfied and I am excited to use this chair for work and gaming!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 12 January 2024

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: I bought this 6 years ago now. It has somehow lived this long and surprisingly still comfortable. Arms have fallen off after being loose for about a year. I kept tightening and eventually took them off cause I sit and game for about 15-18 hours a week. Doesn't hurt my back. Use the lower lumbar support pillow. Great chair and has held up better than other chairs I've owned between $60 and $180. GET IT! 5/5 DURABILITY.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 30 January 2024

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: Pros:Functions perfectlyincline and declineleg restelevation up and downNeck pillowBack supportCons: ,but fixablecan't sit longer than hour without your butt aching, needs more cushion which i then bought off of amazon.Arm rest has no padding, i bought an office arm pad arpund 10 bucks from amazon, works great!Overall, it is a great chair for its price and i highly recommend this chair to anyone.I am a built 190lbs army vet so my body needs more of tlc. That why i bought more cushion and i don't blame the company.Happy with my purchase!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 7 January 2024

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: First, I want to start off with my biggest issues. When I received the chair, it came with no instructions, although wasn‚Äôt difficult to put together.However, the bad part was when I tried to connect the back of the chair to the bottom. The screws I got did not come with nuts or anything to keep the back of the chair in place. So when I tried to attach it, the back of the chair would fall off. I went to Home Depot and bought some nuts, now there‚Äôs no issue. Maybe it was just a manufacturing error and the back of the chair isn‚Äôt supposed to have nuts to keep it attached to the bottom, but regardless I still had to go buy a pack of nuts for 2.75.While this chair fits me comfortably, I am a small guy in terms of height, I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5 and 175 lbs. If you happen to be significantly taller or bigger than me, definitely go for another chair, you will probably not fit in this one.Now that the chair is assembled, it‚Äôs quite comfortable, although I wish the bottom part of the chair had a bit more cushion. I have a fat behind and even I think the bottom of this chair lacks cushioning. The chair is fairly comfortable otherwise and pretty stylish looking. I especially like the foot rest, it‚Äôs something I didn‚Äôt realize how much I needed until now.Had this chair not been missing any pieces, I would rate this a 4/5, but because it was missing pieces, I‚Äôm giving it a 3/5.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 January 2024

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: My son hasn‚Äôt even had this chair a year and it‚Äôs falling apart. He weighs 75 lbs sooo‚Ä¶it‚Äôs not like it has a lot on it. All the seams where the material attaches has detached.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 January 2024

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: Easy to install, semi-comfortable on the seat and back, but the arm rests are not adjustable and they are a hard plastic. I had to have the arm rests sit above my desk in order to sit properly in the chair, but since the arm rests are too high (for me) my back and neck started hurting. I‚Äôm not able to use the chair at all. For reference, I‚Äôm 5‚Äô - 115lbs.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 November 2023

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black
reviews: If you want to save money and have back problems, horrible comfort, a chair that starts to become wobbly after 2 months then this is for you.I've had this chair for a year and I'm surprised it hasn't been thrown into a fire yet.The feeling the poor materials that seem to become thinner as the months go one and your left sitting more on a piece of wood then even a chair. You better off just buying a stool.The arm rests are plastic and kind of lose but the screws are tight (Wonder how that happened).The chair if you move the back down make sure to move up with it or the chair will sucker punch you (Believe me I speak from experience and multiple times of the chair literally moving the back, back up and just straight hitting my jaw full force.).I already have a job that induces back pain. Why not buy a chair that adds to it! This chair doesn't have the best back support and make me feels like the chair cares more about itself then you.If I thought better when I sat on it for the first time i should have just returned it because if it is not comfortable for you and you tell yourself "Itll form to me" good luck because that sure aint never gonna happen.This chair I've tightened the screws many times but the ones for the wheels keep coming lose and for some reason i can rock the chair on the stem. That shouldn't be a problem but it is and make me think if one day im gonna lay back and just fall over.Easy to assemble, hard to enjoy,The only thing nice about this chair is the pillow vibrator but even then i dont use it because it sounds like a jet engine.Moral of the story.Don't waste your money, gaming chairs cheap or expensive isn't worth it. Buy a actually office chair because I bet you itll be more comfortable and better on your back then this piece of junk.And word to the company that makes this chair:"Please never make a chair again" thank you.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 15 November 2020

name: Office Chair PC Gaming Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair Executive PU Leather Computer Chair Lumbar Support with Footrest Modern Task Rolling Swivel Racing Chair for Women&Men, Black

name: AutoFull Gaming Chair Ergonomic Gamer Chair with 3D Bionic Lumbar Support Racing Style PU Leather Computer Gaming Chair for Adults with Footrest,Brown
reviews: This is a fantastic chair in almost every way.  Looks great.  Very comfy and the adjustability is perfect for me.  Really helps get through the working day, even with a back condition.  The foot rest is a great addition too.  It's more like a calf rest, but still very comfy.I only have one negative, but sadly it's a really annoying one.  The backrest of the chair is already creaking quite loudly, only after a few weeks.  I've checked everything is tight, but after careful listening and feeling around, have discovered that the creak is coming from the actual metal framework inside the backrest section.It‚Äôs a real shame, because it does take the edge off a brilliant chair otherwise.UPDATE: After informing Autofull of the creak, they immediately replaced the chair with a new one. It arrived within a couple of days and so far all is good. Really impressed with the service and there was no hesitation in resolving the problem. This is a company with confidence in the product.

reviews: Hallo zusammen,erstmal, m√∂chte ich den Kundendienst von Autofull loben!Da ich durch Home Office, also beruflich dringend auf einen Stuhl angewiesen bin ( kaputter R√ºcken, auf normalen St√ºhlen kann ich nicht sitzen ) wurde dieser auf meine Nachricht beim Kundendienst Samstag bestellt und Dienstag fr√ºh bereits geliefert!Das ist keine Selbstverst√§ndlichkeit! Meine Nachricht wurde schnell beantwortet und versichert, das meine Bestellung einen "Dringlichkeitsbonus" erh√§lt.So ist es dann auch gewesen! :-)√úber diesen schicken, bequemen Stuhl kann ich bis dato nicht schlechtes sagen. F√ºr diese Preisklasse, glaube ich, spielt er ganz sch√∂n weit oben mit.Verarbeitung ist Klasse, die Rollen gehen butterweich √ºber Venyl, Laminat oder Teppichboden, die 2 Kissen machen genau das, was Sie machen sollen... name: AutoFull Gaming Chair Ergonomic Gamer Chair with 3D Bionic Lumbar Support Racing Style PU Leather Computer Gaming Chair for Adults with Footrest,Brown
reviews: To be clear, my order arrived yesterday and I haven't had chance to daily drive it for an extended period, so this will mostly focus on first impressions and build process.The chair arrived in a massive box which was awkward in size and weight so if you have mobility challenges, you may want to have help from the courier or a neighbour.Instructions were printed on cheap paper and had a number of low Res images which made it less clear in one instance of which bolts to use, so I ended up guessing and it seems right so far.Luckily, the rest of the bolts are already in most parts (not tightened) so you only have to unscrew them, position the relevant part, and reinsert the bolts. Super easy.Altogether the chair took around 30mins to build by myself, with only one area presenting a challenge. That was the back when attaching it to the base, a second person would have been nice. This was because the bolts on the side without the mechanism had a slightly harder time being reseated (pardon the pun) and I was worried about stripping the threads briefly. But after some nudging, banging and sweat, they found the thread and went in.Beyond that, the rest really was quite intuitive and simple although I am a tiny bit concerned that there's no real tie between the chair and the piston, it essentially sits atop it and uses the weight to keep it in place. I haven't built many chairs, so, it's unclear if this is normal or not, just seemed weird to me.Once built though it feels sturdy enough, I weigh around 120kg and 5'11" and it's comfy to sit on and looks just like the pictures, so I generally can't complain on that front.I do however have a couple of points to note, the back of the seat feels a bit low, I expected it to extend to match the top of my skull, it doesn't.It feels maybe 4 cm too short and that's really felt with the little pillow, which clips through the holes which on a true racing seat would house your harness straps. That pillow ends up between my shoulder blades and it makes the whole seat feel slightly too small. Similarly, the lumbar cushion is a must, if it wasn't included the back rest would merely create poor posture so worth considering when purchasing.I'm not going to send it back as so far it ticks the boxes (minus the minor points mentioned) but I'll update this review in time if there is any change or noteworthy developments.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 February 2023

Meine Nachricht wurde schnell beantwortet und versichert, das meine Bestellung einen "Dringlichkeitsbonus" erh√§lt.So ist es dann auch gewesen! :-)√úber diesen schicken, bequemen Stuhl kann ich bis dato nicht schlechtes sagen. F√ºr diese Preisklasse, glaube ich, spielt er ganz sch√∂n weit oben mit.Verarbeitung ist Klasse, die Rollen gehen butterweich √ºber Venyl, Laminat oder Teppichboden, die 2 Kissen machen genau das, was Sie machen sollen... Bequem und ohne Schmerzen l√§ngere Zeit den Sitzkomfort unterst√ºtzen.Das ist zuerst etwas ungewohnt, nach k√ºrzester Zeit hat man sich aber bereits daran gewohnt.Das rot, schwarze Design schaut zudem sehr schick aus!Ich kann meinen Kauf √ºber diesen Stuhl, jedem zu 100% empfehlen, der sich nach einem guten, Preis und leistungsgerechten Gaming Stuhl umsieht :-)Vielen Dank f√ºr's lesen

name: AutoFull Gaming Chair Ergonomic Gamer Chair with 3D Bionic Lumbar Support Racing Style PU Leather Computer Gaming Chair for Adults with Footrest,Brown
reviews: To be clear, my order arrived yesterday and I haven't had chance to daily drive it for an extended period, so this will mostly focus on first impressions and build process.The chair arrived in a massive box which was awkward in size and weight so if you have mobility challenges, you may want to have help from the courier or a neighbour.Instructions were printed on cheap paper and had a number of low Res images which made it less clear in one instance of which bolts to use, so I ended up guessing and it seems right so far.Luckily, the rest of the bolts are already in most parts (not tightened) so you only have to unscrew them, position the relevant part, and reinsert the bolts. Super easy.Altogether the chair took around 30mins to build by myself, with only one area presenting a challenge. That was the back when attaching it to the base, a second person would have been nice. This was because the bolts on the side without the mechanism had a slightly harder time being reseated (pardon the pun) and I was worried about stripping the threads briefly. But after some nudging, banging and sweat, they found the thread and went in.Beyond that, the rest really was quite intuitive and simple although I am a tiny bit concerned that there's no real tie between the chair and the piston, it essentially sits atop it and uses the weight to keep it in place. I haven't built many chairs, so, it's unclear if this is normal or not, just seemed weird to me.Once built though it feels sturdy enough, I weigh around 120kg and 5'11" and it's comfy to sit on and looks just like the pictures, so I generally can't complain on that front.I do however have a couple of points to note, the back of the seat feels a bit low, I expected it to extend to match the top of my skull, it doesn't.It feels maybe 4 cm too short and that's really felt with the little pillow, which clips through the holes which on a true racing seat would house your harness straps. That pillow ends up between my shoulder blades and it makes the whole seat feel slightly too small. Similarly, the lumbar cushion is a must, if it wasn't included the back rest would merely create poor posture so worth considering when purchasing.I'm not going to send it back as so far it ticks the boxes (minus the minor points mentioned) but I'll update this review in time if there is any change or noteworthy developments.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 February 2023

name: FURINNO 11087AM/BK Just 3-Tier No Tools Tube end Table, Americano/Black
reviews: I wanted to increase the available space in my bedroom, and eliminate the large surface area and drawer of a regular nightstand - because in my case they both tend to fill up with clutter very fast. I call the nightstand drawer 'the put it here for now drawer', but  most other people would probably refer to it as their bedroom junk drawer.I didn't post a picture of this, it looks exactly like in the details picture, which is a big plus considering many of the sellers here on Amazon.It went together fast, easy, all the required parts were in the box, everything fit correctly. NO instructions necessary, took less than six or seven minutes including unboxing it. AND AMAZON ASKS $49 FOR "EXPERT ASSEMBLY"? WHERE DO I SIGN UP FOR THAT JOB!I needed something to place an alarm clock, some pill bottles, my phone, and a  large glass of water on top of this table overnight. This table proves to be too unstable, and the glass of water spilled over after seemingly small movements and barely touching the stand on the first night of use. I tried to use a water bottle instead of a glass, but it fell of a couple of times when I brushed my hand against the table while replacing the bottle back onto the stand, after taking a drink in the wee hours o' the morning.I tried putting it further away from the bed so my sheets or blanket would not hit the table when I flip over, (I toss and turn a lot at night) but had to reach farther away and be cautions not let my hand brush against the stand or the water would spill and the pill bottles and would fall over and roll off.I can see this for someone who wants to use is for an alarm clock, phone charging/stand, a small lamp, a book or two and maybe a few other things. Or use it for a small end table for keeping remotes, phone, a small lamp. But not good for keeping or putting on top of it anything that might fall over when unbalanced.Construction for the price point is decent, and it looks nice. You can  tell the MDF/particle board whichever, or as their calling these now 'engineered woods' (sawdust and resin, and pretty soon they won't even be using the sawdust at all) is sturdier than most other low end furnishings in this price range.I can't recommend it for what I needed it for, but it might work for you, but it is wobbly and any liquid in a  drinking glass, or a soup bowl will likely spill over onto the table top and floor.I will give it an overall 4 stars because I was already aware of the table's potential to wobble after reading comments and Q&A sections, and it was a little better than I expected but not as good as I needed it to be, so I took a chance.  And I really didn't expect that I'd be getting a hand crafted 'MADE PRIMARILY FROM ACTUAL TREE WOOD' nightstand.I'd like to keep it if I had a use for it, I've already printed the Amazon return label.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 April 2022

name: FURINNO 11087AM/BK Just 3-Tier No Tools Tube end Table, Americano/Black
reviews: I wanted something small, inexpensive, and not too tall to hold my laptop as I lay on the couch, so that I could browse the internet while I watch tv.  In that way, I'm occupied during commercials or during less-than- interesting movies. (I'm a huge movie fan.)This table fills the bill well.  Don't expect a piece of fine-looking furniture, however, as its price (cheap) matches its look.

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: i had already ordered some night stands of this brand already and was pleased with the product I was expecting the same with this coffee table. It is small and super easy to put together. I am in a studio apartment and it is the perfect size although it is a little shorter than I had hoped, none the less it makes my living room work. The drawers a small but big enough I can fit the typical TV remotes and video game controllers.  The fabric drawers leave a little more to be desired just kind of want them to be a little more rigid like a drawer but I can always find others. I have seen other people ask questions about how sturdy this is and that is the only "flaw" and I don't even want to call it a flaw it's just the only thing I REALLY think it needs work on. You can eat off it no problem, writing on it no problem, you can lean or even prop your feet on it. However no you cannot put your aquarium on it, no you cannot stand on it and you should probably not put a TV on here. This is a coffee table it is small. It is also make of particle board. It's a bit wobbly and won't hold much weight but for eating, propping up feet or even doing some work on the floor it is great. The price is awesome and you can get a whole set from the same brand cheap. Would totally recommend this coffee table and their night stands for the minimalist type of person and someone looking for something cheap that gets the job done.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 June 2020

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: Bought this to replace a small $9 Ikea table that I'd been using as a coffee table, and it's perfectly fine. I will confess that I am an idiot and was briefly confused, but it only took me ~20 min to assemble in the end. It's cheap but fairly hefty. Surface ain't waterproof, so either use coasters or accept the fact that you'll have rings.

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: Elegant piece, well built and easy to move.Feels sturdy and more surface space than expected - pleasantly surprised!The baskets are flimsy though I put extra cardboard in bottom to support! Constantly getting compliments on it.

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: The materials are low end, but at this price you should expect nothing else. It looks nice, fits a very cramped living area well without being obtrusive and was easy to assemble.Why one star off? The cheap particle board I can live, the finish is reasonable, but the fasteners were so soft I could bend them with my hands. Even at this price point buying decent screws and making sure all the dowels were intact seems like something I can't give a manufacturer a pass on.

reviews: Looks good in my sitting room
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 January 2024

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: I bought this despite many bad reviews; there were also good ones -- I might be lucky!I don't understand reviewers who complained it was small.  Didn't they look at the very clear measurements before they ordered it? It's exactly as advertised  (& exactly what I wanted).And I don't understand reviewers who complained it wasn't the greatest quality.  Did they expect the quality of tables two or three times the price?  Time will tell whether it stands up to my expectations of a lower-cost product -- initially, it does.Mine arrived late, with an apology from Amazon.  All parts were there, & nothing was damaged.  The surfaces have marks that aren't part of the grain, but they blend in & are acceptable.  I intend to get a piece of glass cut to cover the top; reviews suggest that it marks very easily.Assembly was quick & easy.  I was gentle, since some reviews reported damage during assembly.  I think some of the pictures in the instructions could be improved, but with common sense I had no problems.  However, a big negative was the holes that were drilled for the dowels.  I pushed the dowels in with my thumb, not the rubber hammer suggested, & they went in so far that very little remained above the surface (until I pulled them back out half-way with pliers). It would be better if the dowel holes were drilled to a depth of half the dowels' length -- presumably it affects the overall sturdiness of the product if two parts don't make an equal connection.It's fine with or without the drawers.  I'm going to lift rather than drag it if I move it, despite the little feet you hammer in the bottom; I can anticipate the sides of the 'legs' lifting off if they catch on carpet or other floor-covering.I bought this purely on size -- I couldn't find anything else the same.  It looks good, & seems sturdy; with no kids & no pets, I'm hoping I'm as pleased with it in a couple of years' time as I am now.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 11 January 2020

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: For the price this table is very pretty. The color of the collapsible storage bins leaves a bit to be desired but those can easily be changed to a color that more suits your flair. You will want to look for 4.5x10x14‚Äù ish. The table was easy to put together, the directions were written well. I think it took me like ten minutes. The packaging was not so great. It arrived beat up and the eco friendly foam blocks they used had somehow been shredded in parts so it left me, my black dog and my wood floors covered in white snow that 24 hrs later I‚Äôm still trying to remove. It clings to everything! Just a warning so you can plan your preparation area accordingly. I got the espresso color and it‚Äôs beautiful. It does have a couple of minor scratches on it. The trim is where the cheap price is evident as numerous areas were loose on arrival. I‚Äôve glued them, but who knows how long it will stay. I do love the fact it has little feet you can hammer on so it protects from scratching. There is room for improvement, but it‚Äôs not the worst thing in the world.  Overall it is an OK affordable piece that will get me through til my next move, but won‚Äôt hold up through the move.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 February 2023

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: Una mesa muy ligera y f√°cil de montar, en 30 min. Y sin complicaci√≥n, no soy mucho de montar y es f√°cil.Perfecta para el sal√≥n
date.of.review: Reviewed in Spain on 30 May 2019

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: Pros:~It's cheap; bought it for my 7 yr old's room to store toys and be a play table. Nice fabric bins which will surly last longer than the table.Cons:~Very low budget materials - I wouldn't even call this particle board, it's like recycled particle board or sawdust w/ glue (funny now that I look it does describe it with recycled materials...)~The laminate is peeling already out of the box.~Sections are close but not perfect fit for assemblyOther:I used glue to assemble and fix loose laminate to attempt to sturdy this table up, which seemed to help. I also glued a non-slip pad to the top to make a nice play top which came out nice (Shop Fox W1322 Anti-Vibration Pad 24-Inch by 36-Inch, Black). So all in all it'll do what I needed it to do but I don't think I will be buying the set, which to me has a great design but is really bad material; A glass with condensation on it would destroy it first time. I would've rated a 2 star but realizing you get what you pay for this isn't too bad.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 December 2013

I intend to get a piece of glass cut to cover the top; reviews suggest that it marks very easily.Assembly was quick & easy.  I was gentle, since some reviews reported damage during assembly.  I think some of the pictures in the instructions could be improved, but with common sense I had no problems.  However, a big negative was the holes that were drilled for the dowels.  I pushed the dowels in with my thumb, not the rubber hammer suggested, & they went in so far that very little remained above the surface (until I pulled them back out half-way with pliers). It would be better if the dowel holes were drilled to a depth of half the dowels' length -- presumably it affects the overall sturdiness of the product if two parts don't make an equal connection.It's fine with or without the drawers.  I'm going to lift rather than drag it if I move it, despite the little feet you hammer in the bottom; I can anticipate the sides of the 'legs' lifting off if they catch on carpet or other floor-covering.I bought this purely on size -- I couldn't find anything else the same.  It looks good, & seems sturdy; with no kids & no pets, I'm hoping I'm as pleased with it in a couple of years' time as I am now.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 11 January 2020

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: For the price this table is very pretty. The color of the collapsible storage bins leaves a bit to be desired but those can easily be changed to a color that more suits your flair. You will want to look for 4.5x10x14‚Äù ish. The table was easy to put together, the directions were written well. I think it took me like ten minutes. The packaging was not so great. It arrived beat up and the eco friendly foam blocks they used had somehow been shredded in parts so it left me, my black dog and my wood floors covered in white snow that 24 hrs later I‚Äôm still trying to remove. It clings to everything! Just a warning so you can plan your preparation area accordingly. I got the espresso color and it‚Äôs beautiful. It does have a couple of minor scratches on it. The trim is where the cheap price is evident as numerous areas were loose on arrival. I‚Äôve glued them, but who knows how long it will stay. I do love the fact it has little feet you can hammer on so it protects from scratching. There is room for improvement, but it‚Äôs not the worst thing in the world.  Overall it is an OK affordable piece that will get me through til my next move, but won‚Äôt hold up through the move.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 February 2023

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: Una mesa muy ligera y f√°cil de montar, en 30 min. Y sin complicaci√≥n, no soy mucho de montar y es f√°cil.Perfecta para el sal√≥n

name: Furinno Coffee Table with Bins, Espresso/Brown
reviews: Pros:~It's cheap; bought it for my 7 yr old's room to store toys and be a play table. Nice fabric bins which will surly last longer than the table.Cons:~Very low budget materials - I wouldn't even call this particle board, it's like recycled particle board or sawdust w/ glue (funny now that I look it does describe it with recycled materials...)~The laminate is peeling already out of the box.~Sections are close but not perfect fit for assemblyOther:I used glue to assemble and fix loose laminate to attempt to sturdy this table up, which seemed to help. I also glued a non-slip pad to the top to make a nice play top which came out nice (Shop Fox W1322 Anti-Vibration Pad 24-Inch by 36-Inch, Black). So all in all it'll do what I needed it to do but I don't think I will be buying the set, which to me has a great design but is really bad material; A glass with condensation on it would destroy it first time. I would've rated a 2 star but realizing you get what you pay for this isn't too bad.

date.of.review: Reviewed in Italy on 10 June 2020

name: Furinno Wooden Side Table with 3 Shelves Sonoma Oak/White 29.21 x 34.04 x 57.91 cm
reviews: After buying and giving away numerous small chests of drawers to sit either side of the bed, I decided a table would be better.  I tested this with a small table at home and it seemed to work so I began to look for something more appropriate.I landed on this sales page during my search through the options on Amazon.  I liked the height - perfect for the side of a bed.  I liked the size - not too large so would not get in the way (it isn't a huge bedroom).  I liked the idea of a couple of shelves since it would mean I could "share" on different shelves what normally sits cluttered on the top.I decided to take the risk and order 2 of these tables in the black and white, with white tube legs.  I felt having contrasting colours set against white bedding and a white headboard would fit nicely.  I was right, the two-colour scheme is ideal.Delivery was naturally quick with Amazon and each table was housed in its own box.  A quick slice around to remove the sellotape, everything seemed to be packaged neatly so I removed each item.  I decided to first try with the black tops on the top and bottom, with the white shelf top in the centre (turns out that was a good choice in my case).Construction - if only all flat-packed furniture was as easy as this to construct. One glance at the instructions to find the order of putting things together and I didn't need them again.  A quick dust of the shelves and the first one was ready to sit next to the bed.  Perfect.For the second box I decided to time myself.  Obviously the construction was identical to the first.  From the time I started to open the box to the time I wiped surface dust away was... a mere 8 minutes.  Like I said, if only all flat-packed furniture was this easy.  The second table went on the other side of the bed, job done, boxes into recycling bin.Although plastic tubes for the legs, they are quite thick and the whole unit is very sturdy.  Each piece screws into the one beneath it so it effectively holds itself together.  I should imagine it would be just as easy to unscrew parts if ever I wanted to change the top colour of any of the shelves.Negatives - I didn't expect absolute perfection, not for the price these were.  However, I did feel that the finish of the white binding could have been much better, especially where it meets white against white.  As I said, for the price I didn't expect perfection but given that the binding is an integral part of the design, it could have been applied better.  Thankfully, given where the tables are, I doubt if anyone would ever get close enough to inspect.  There was a 6" "smudge across the middle of one of the shelves, on the black side.  This was clearly done at the factory and no amount of rubbing would shift it.  Fortunately, I could use this as a centre shelf with a white top, but it would cause problems if ever I wanted to have all shelf tops in black.As a result of the unnecessary "smudge" that should have been picked up by quality control, and the not-so-good finish with the binding around the shelves, I have removed one star from my review, simply because I felt it best to give future customers an idea of what to look for.Priced at ¬£18.29 at the time of this review for each table, even with the slight flaws I have mentioned, I find the price to be acceptable.  They were easy to construct, plenty sturdy enough for bedside tables, will easily hold whatever I need to put on them, and I do like the black and white colouring, it is quite striking.  Even with the flaws, I will recommend this product, I doubt if you would get much better for the money and I am satisfied enough.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 October 2022

They were easy to construct, plenty sturdy enough for bedside tables, will easily hold whatever I need to put on them, and I do like the black and white colouring, it is quite striking.  Even with the flaws, I will recommend this product, I doubt if you would get much better for the money and I am satisfied enough.

name: Furinno Wooden Side Table with 3 Shelves Sonoma Oak/White 29.21 x 34.04 x 57.91 cm
reviews: After buying and giving away numerous small chests of drawers to sit either side of the bed, I decided a table would be better.  I tested this with a small table at home and it seemed to work so I began to look for something more appropriate.I landed on this sales page during my search through the options on Amazon.  I liked the height - perfect for the side of a bed.  I liked the size - not too large so would not get in the way (it isn't a huge bedroom).  I liked the idea of a couple of shelves since it would mean I could "share" on different shelves what normally sits cluttered on the top.I decided to take the risk and order 2 of these tables in the black and white, with white tube legs.  I felt having contrasting colours set against white bedding and a white headboard would fit nicely.  I was right, the two-colour scheme is ideal.Delivery was naturally quick with Amazon and each table was housed in its own box.  A quick slice around to remove the sellotape, everything seemed to be packaged neatly so I removed each item.  I decided to first try with the black tops on the top and bottom, with the white shelf top in the centre (turns out that was a good choice in my case).Construction - if only all flat-packed furniture was as easy as this to construct. One glance at the instructions to find the order of putting things together and I didn't need them again.  A quick dust of the shelves and the first one was ready to sit next to the bed.  Perfect.For the second box I decided to time myself.  Obviously the construction was identical to the first.  From the time I started to open the box to the time I wiped surface dust away was... a mere 8 minutes.  Like I said, if only all flat-packed furniture was this easy.  The second table went on the other side of the bed, job done, boxes into recycling bin.Although plastic tubes for the legs, they are quite thick and the whole unit is very sturdy.  Each piece screws into the one beneath it so it effectively holds itself together.  I should imagine it would be just as easy to unscrew parts if ever I wanted to change the top colour of any of the shelves.Negatives - I didn't expect absolute perfection, not for the price these were.  However, I did feel that the finish of the white binding could have been much better, especially where it meets white against white.  As I said, for the price I didn't expect perfection but given that the binding is an integral part of the design, it could have been applied better.  Thankfully, given where the tables are, I doubt if anyone would ever get close enough to inspect.  There was a 6" "smudge across the middle of one of the shelves, on the black side.  This was clearly done at the factory and no amount of rubbing would shift it.  Fortunately, I could use this as a centre shelf with a white top, but it would cause problems if ever I wanted to have all shelf tops in black.As a result of the unnecessary "smudge" that should have been picked up by quality control, and the not-so-good finish with the binding around the shelves, I have removed one star from my review, simply because I felt it best to give future customers an idea of what to look for.Priced at ¬£18.29 at the time of this review for each table, even with the slight flaws I have mentioned, I find the price to be acceptable.  They were easy to construct, plenty sturdy enough for bedside tables, will easily hold whatever I need to put on them, and I do like the black and white colouring, it is quite striking.  Even with the flaws, I will recommend this product, I doubt if you would get much better for the money and I am satisfied enough.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 31 October 2022
